</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE14<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE14"> </a></td><td>Date of birth</td><td><div><p>The client's date of birth (DOB) if known</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE15<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE15"> </a></td><td>Date of birth unknown</td><td><div><p>Is the client's DOB is unknown?</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE16<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE16"> </a></td><td>Estimated age</td><td><div><p>If DOB is unknown, enter the client's estimated age. Display client's age in number of years.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE17<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE17"> </a></td><td>Age</td><td><div><p>Calculated age (number of years) of the client based on date of birth</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE34<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE34"> </a></td><td>Polygamous</td><td><div><p>Client is in a polygamous union</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE35<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE35"> </a></td><td>Divorced</td><td><div><p>Client is divorced, whereby marriage contract has been declared dissolved and inactive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE36<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE36"> </a></td><td>Widowed</td><td><div><p>Client's spouse has died</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE37<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE37"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>Client does not wish to disclose marital status</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE38<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE38"> </a></td><td>Domestic partner</td><td><div><p>Client reports that they are in a domestic partnership</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE39<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE39"> </a></td><td>Annulled</td><td><div><p>Client's marriage contract has been declared null and to have not existed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE40<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE40"> </a></td><td>Legally separated</td><td><div><p>Client is legally separated from their spouse</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE41<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE41"> </a></td><td>Interlocutory</td><td><div><p>Client is subject to an interlocutory decree</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE42<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE42"> </a></td><td>Telephone number</td><td><div><p>Client's telephone number (a landline or a mobile phone number)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE43<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE43"> </a></td><td>Administrative Area</td><td><div><p>This should be a context-specific list of administrative areas, such as villages, districts, etc. The purpose of this data element is to allow for grouping and flagging of client data to a particular facility's catchment area. This can be input into the system by the end user OR it can be automated in the database based on the end user's attributes.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE44<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE44"> </a></td><td>Communication consent</td><td><div><p>Indication that client gave consent to be contacted</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE45<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE45"> </a></td><td>Reminder messages</td><td><div><p>Whether client wants to receive text or other messages as follow-up for HIV services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE46<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE46"> </a></td><td>Communication preference(s)</td><td><div><p>How the client would like to receive family planning communications</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE47<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE47"> </a></td><td>Text message/SMS</td><td><div><p>The client would like to receive communications via Text message/SMS</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE48<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE48"> </a></td><td>Voice call</td><td><div><p>Client would like to receive communications via voice call</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE49<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE49"> </a></td><td>Client's email</td><td><div><p>Client's primary email account where the client can be contacted</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE50<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE50"> </a></td><td>Alternate contact's name</td><td><div><p>Name of an alternate contact, which could be next of kin (e.g. partner, husband, mother, sibling, etc.). The alternate contact would be used in the case of an emergency situation.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE51<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE51"> </a></td><td>Alternate contact's phone number</td><td><div><p>Phone number of the alternate contact</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE52<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE52"> </a></td><td>Alternate contact's address</td><td><div><p>Alternate contact's home address or address which the client is consenting to disclose</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.A.DE53<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46A.46DE53"> </a></td><td>Alternate contact relationship</td><td><div><p>The alternate contact's relationship to the client (e.g. partner, husband, mother, sibling, etc.)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE1<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE1"> </a></td><td>Reason for visit</td><td><div><p>Reason for HIV testing services visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE2<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE2"> </a></td><td>First-time HIV test</td><td><div><p>First encounter for screening for human immunodeficiency virus</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE3<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE3"> </a></td><td>Retesting for HIV</td><td><div><p>Retesting for human immunodeficiency virus</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE4<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE4"> </a></td><td>HIV testing services visit</td><td><div><p>Client attending facility for HIV testing services visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE5<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE5"> </a></td><td>Referred through partner services</td><td><div><p>Client reported coming to the facility after receiving a provider-assisted referral or patient referral from a contact or partner</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE6<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE6"> </a></td><td>Partner or contact of an index case</td><td><div><p>The client is a contact or partner of a person diagnosed with HIV (an index case)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE7<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE7"> </a></td><td>Partner or contact of an HIV testing client (non-index case)</td><td><div><p>The client is a contact or partner identified through partner or social network services, but is not known to be a partner of an index-case</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE8<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE8"> </a></td><td>Type of contact or partner for partner services</td><td><div><p>Client's relationship to the person that referred the client for partner services or family services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE9<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE9"> </a></td><td>Biological child</td><td><div><p>Client is the biological child of the person that referred the client for family services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE10<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE10"> </a></td><td>Drug-injecting partner</td><td><div><p>Client is a drug-injecting partner of the person that referred the client for partner services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE11<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE11"> </a></td><td>Sexual partner</td><td><div><p>Client is a sexual partner of the person that referred the client for partner services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE12<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE12"> </a></td><td>Social contact</td><td><div><p>Client is a social contact of the person that referred the client for social-network services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE13<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE13"> </a></td><td>Contact with and (suspected) exposure to HIV</td><td><div><p>When the client is reported to have had suspected exposure to HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE14<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE14"> </a></td><td>Date/time of suspected exposure to HIV</td><td><div><p>Date and time when the client had suspected exposure to HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE15<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE15"> </a></td><td>Testing entry point</td><td><div><p>Whether testing is happening in the community or at a facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE16<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE16"> </a></td><td>Community-level testing</td><td><div><p>Testing is happening in the community, which includes mobile testing</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE17<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE17"> </a></td><td>Facility-level testing</td><td><div><p>Testing is happening at a facility</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE20<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE20"> </a></td><td>Voluntary counselling and testing centres (not within a health facility setting)</td><td><div><p>The client tested at a voluntary counselling and testing centre (not in a health facility setting)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE21<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE21"> </a></td><td>Other community-based testing</td><td><div><p>The client tested through another type of community-based testing</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE22<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE22"> </a></td><td>Entry point for facility-level testing</td><td><div><p>Specific point where testing is happening at a facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE23<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE23"> </a></td><td>Provider-initiated tested in a clinic or emergency facility</td><td><div><p>The client tested though provider-initiated HIV testing &amp; counselling, which could be at an emergency facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE24<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE24"> </a></td><td>Antenatal care clinic</td><td><div><p>The client tested at an antenatal care clinic, including labour and delivery</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE25<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE25"> </a></td><td>Voluntary counselling and testing (within a health facility setting)</td><td><div><p>The client tested through voluntary counselling and testing (within a health facility setting)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE26<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE26"> </a></td><td>Family planning clinic</td><td><div><p>The client tested at a family planning clinic</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE28<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE28"> </a></td><td>Tuberculosis (TB) clinic</td><td><div><p>The client tested at a TB clinic</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE29<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE29"> </a></td><td>Currently pregnant</td><td><div><p>Client is currently pregnant</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE30<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE30"> </a></td><td>Gestational age</td><td><div><p>Gestational age in weeks and/or days depending on the source of gestational age</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE31<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE31"> </a></td><td>Expected date of delivery (EDD)</td><td><div><p>Expected date of delivery based on gestational age</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE32<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE32"> </a></td><td>Breastfeeding</td><td><div><p>Infant is being breastfed by mother</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE33<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE33"> </a></td><td>Partner HIV status (reported)</td><td><div><p>The HIV status of the client's partner.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE34<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE34"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>Client's partner is HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE35<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE35"> </a></td><td>HIV-negative</td><td><div><p>Client's partner is HIV-negative</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE36<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE36"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>Don't know HIV status - client does not know partner's HIV status</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE37<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE37"> </a></td><td>Partner is from a key population</td><td><div><p>Client's partner is a member of a key population, that has an increased risk of HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE38<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE38"> </a></td><td>Sex worker</td><td><div><p>Client's partner is a sex worker</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE39<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE39"> </a></td><td>Men who have sex with men</td><td><div><p>Client's partner is a man who has sex with men</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE40<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE40"> </a></td><td>Trans and gender-diverse people</td><td><div><p>Client's partner identifies as trans and gender-diverse</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE41<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE41"> </a></td><td>People who inject drugs</td><td><div><p>Client's partner is a person who injects drugs</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE42<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE42"> </a></td><td>People living in prisons and other closed settings</td><td><div><p>Client's partner lives in a prison or other closed setting</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE43<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE43"> </a></td><td>Has used an HIV self-test before (reported)</td><td><div><p>The client reported having used an HIV self-test before</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE44<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE44"> </a></td><td>HIV self-test result</td><td><div><p>Results from the reported HIV self-test</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE45<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE45"> </a></td><td>Reactive</td><td><div><p>The HIV self-test was reactive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE46<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE46"> </a></td><td>Non-reactive</td><td><div><p>The HIV self-test was non-reactive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE47<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE47"> </a></td><td>Invalid</td><td><div><p>The HIV self-test was invalid</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE48<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE48"> </a></td><td>Date of HIV self-test</td><td><div><p>Date when the HIV self-test was conducted</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE49<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE49"> </a></td><td>Key population member</td><td><div><p>Client is a member of a key population that has an increased risk of HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE50<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE50"> </a></td><td>Key population member type</td><td><div><p>The type of key population that the client is included in</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE51<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE51"> </a></td><td>Sex worker</td><td><div><p>Client is a sex worker</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE52<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE52"> </a></td><td>Men who have sex with men</td><td><div><p>Client is a man who has sex with men</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE53<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE53"> </a></td><td>Trans and gender-diverse people</td><td><div><p>Client identifies as trans and gender-diverse</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE54<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE54"> </a></td><td>People who inject drugs</td><td><div><p>Client is a person who injects drugs</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE55<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE55"> </a></td><td>People living in prisons and other closed settings</td><td><div><p>Client lives in a prison or another closed setting</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE56<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE56"> </a></td><td>Adolescent girl</td><td><div><p>Calculated field based on age and gender, if client is 10 years or older and under 20 years old</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE57<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE57"> </a></td><td>Young woman</td><td><div><p>Calculated field based on age and gender, if client is 20 years or older and under 25 years old</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE58<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE58"> </a></td><td>Orphan or vulnerable child</td><td><div><p>Client considered an orphan or vulnerable child</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE59<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE59"> </a></td><td>Informed of HIV test result</td><td><div><p>Client has been informed of their HIV test result</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE60<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE60"> </a></td><td>Date HIV test results returned</td><td><div><p>Date HIV test result returned to client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE61<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE61"> </a></td><td>HIV exposure type</td><td><div><p>Ways in which the client was exposed to HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE62<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE62"> </a></td><td>Occupational</td><td><div><p>Occupational exposure to HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE63<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE63"> </a></td><td>Non-occupational violent</td><td><div><p>Non-occupational violent exposure to HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE64<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE64"> </a></td><td>Non-occupational consensual sex</td><td><div><p>Exposure to HIV through non-occupational consensual sex</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE65<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE65"> </a></td><td>Date informed of HIV-positive diagnosis</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client was diagnosed with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE66<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE66"> </a></td><td>HIV diagnosing facility</td><td><div><p>The facility where the client received an HIV-positive diagnosis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE67<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE67"> </a></td><td>Date of first positive test indicative of HIV diagnosis</td><td><div><p>Earliest date of HIV diagnosis determined according to the national HIV testing algorithm</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE68<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE68"> </a></td><td>HIV serotype</td><td><div><p>The client's HIV serotype</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE69<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE69"> </a></td><td>HIV-1</td><td><div><p>The client has HIV-1</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE70<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE70"> </a></td><td>HIV-2</td><td><div><p>The client has HIV-2</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE71<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE71"> </a></td><td>HIV diagnosis date</td><td><div><p>Date diagnosis was returned to client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE72<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE72"> </a></td><td>ART start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client started or restarted antiretroviral therapy (ART)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE73<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE73"> </a></td><td>Age at diagnosis</td><td><div><p>The client's age (in years) when given an HIV diagnosis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE74<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE74"> </a></td><td>Type of contact elicited</td><td><div><p>Client's relationship to the contact identified for voluntary partner services or family services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE75<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE75"> </a></td><td>Biological child</td><td><div><p>Contact identified for family services is the biological child of the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE76<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE76"> </a></td><td>Drug-injecting partner</td><td><div><p>Contact identified for partner services is a drug-injecting partner of the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE77<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE77"> </a></td><td>Sexual partner</td><td><div><p>Contact identified for partner services is a sexual partner of the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE78<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE78"> </a></td><td>Social contact</td><td><div><p>Contact identified for social-network services is a social contact of the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE79<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE79"> </a></td><td>HIV test ordered</td><td><div><p>An HIV test of the client was ordered by the provider</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE80<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE80"> </a></td><td>HIV test conducted</td><td><div><p>An HIV test was performed on the client during the visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE81<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE81"> </a></td><td>HIV test type</td><td><div><p>Type of HIV test</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE82<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE82"> </a></td><td>Rapid diagnostic test for HIV</td><td><div><p>Antibody test for HIV performed with a rapid diagnostic</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE83<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE83"> </a></td><td>Enzyme immunoassay for HIV</td><td><div><p>Antibody test for HIV performed with an enzyme immunoassay</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE84<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE84"> </a></td><td>Nucleic acid test for HIV</td><td><div><p>Virological test, which includes testing for early infant diagnosis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE85<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE85"> </a></td><td>Dual HIV/syphilis rapid diagnostic test</td><td><div><p>Antibody test for HIV and syphilis performed with a rapid diagnostic</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE86<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE86"> </a></td><td>HIV self-test</td><td><div><p>Antibody test for HIV performed by self-tester using a rapid diagnostic</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE87<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE87"> </a></td><td>Date HIV test sent</td><td><div><p>Date HIV specimen was sent to lab</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE88<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE88"> </a></td><td>Assay number in testing strategy</td><td><div><p>The number of the assay (test kit) in the HIV testing strategy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE89<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE89"> </a></td><td>Assay 0</td><td><div><p>A community outreach test-for-triage or self-test which is not included in the HIV testing strategy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE90<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE90"> </a></td><td>Assay 1</td><td><div><p>The first test in the HIV testing strategy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE91<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE91"> </a></td><td>Assay 2</td><td><div><p>The second test in the HIV testing strategy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE92<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE92"> </a></td><td>Assay 3</td><td><div><p>The third test in the HIV testing strategy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE93<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE93"> </a></td><td>Assay 1 repeated</td><td><div><p>The first test in the HIV testing strategy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE94<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE94"> </a></td><td>Test result of HIV assay 1</td><td><div><p>The result of the first HIV assay in the testing strategy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE95<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE95"> </a></td><td>Reactive</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was reactive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE96<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE96"> </a></td><td>Non-reactive</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was non-reactive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE97<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE97"> </a></td><td>Invalid</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was invalid</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE98<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE98"> </a></td><td>Test result of HIV assay 2</td><td><div><p>The result of the second HIV assay in the testing strategy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE99<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE99"> </a></td><td>Reactive</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was reactive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE100<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE100"> </a></td><td>Non-reactive</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was non-reactive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE101<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE101"> </a></td><td>Invalid</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was invalid</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE102<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE102"> </a></td><td>Test result of HIV assay 3</td><td><div><p>The result of the third HIV assay in the testing strategy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE103<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE103"> </a></td><td>Reactive</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was reactive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE104<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE104"> </a></td><td>Non-reactive</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was non-reactive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE105<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE105"> </a></td><td>Invalid</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was invalid</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE106<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE106"> </a></td><td>Test result of HIV assay 1 repeated</td><td><div><p>The result of the repeated first HIV assay in the testing strategy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE107<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE107"> </a></td><td>Reactive</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was reactive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE108<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE108"> </a></td><td>Non-reactive</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was non-reactive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE109<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE109"> </a></td><td>Invalid</td><td><div><p>The result of the HIV assay in the testing strategy was invalid</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE110<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE110"> </a></td><td>HIV test date</td><td><div><p>Date of the HIV test</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE111<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE111"> </a></td><td>HIV test result</td><td><div><p>The result from HIV testing after applying the testing algorithm</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE112<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE112"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>Test result is HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE113<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE113"> </a></td><td>HIV-negative</td><td><div><p>Test result is HIV-negative</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE114<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE114"> </a></td><td>HIV-inconclusive</td><td><div><p>Test result is HIV-inconclusive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE115<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE115"> </a></td><td>HIV status</td><td><div><p>HIV status reported after applying the national HIV testing algorithm. No single HIV test can provide an HIV-positive diagnosis.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE116<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE116"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>Client is HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE117<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE117"> </a></td><td>HIV-negative</td><td><div><p>Client is HIV-negative</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE118<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE118"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>Client has unknown HIV status</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE119<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE119"> </a></td><td>Date positive HIV test confirmed</td><td><div><p>Date patient received positive HIV test confirmation (with written documentation)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE120<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE120"> </a></td><td>Site where positive HIV test confirmed</td><td><div><p>Name or identifier of health facility where HIV test was confirmed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE121<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE121"> </a></td><td>Probable route of transmission</td><td><div><p>Probable route(s) of transmission of HIV to client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE122<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE122"> </a></td><td>Heterosexual sex</td><td><div><p>Probable route of HIV transmission was through heterosexual sex</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE123<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE123"> </a></td><td>Sex between men</td><td><div><p>Probable route of HIV transmission was through sex between men</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE124<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE124"> </a></td><td>Unprotected intercourse during sex work</td><td><div><p>Probable route of HIV transmission was through unprotected intercourse during sex work</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE125<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE125"> </a></td><td>Injecting drug use with unsterile equipment</td><td><div><p>Probable route of HIV transmission was through injecting drug use with unsterile equipment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE126<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE126"> </a></td><td>Nosocomial</td><td><div><p>Probable route of HIV transmission was nosocomial</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE127<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE127"> </a></td><td>Vertical</td><td><div><p>Probable route of HIV transmission to an infant was during pregnancy, labour, delivery and breastfeeding (vertical transmission)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE128<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE128"> </a></td><td>Other</td><td><div><p>Probable route of HIV transmission was other and may include needle accidents, blood transfusion, blood products or organ/tissue donations, tattoos, piercings, circumcision, or acupuncture.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE129<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE129"> </a></td><td>Partner HIV test conducted</td><td><div><p>If the client does not know the HIV status of the client's partner(s), offer to test and add results here</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE130<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE130"> </a></td><td>Partner HIV test ordered</td><td><div><p>An HIV test for the client's partner has been ordered</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE131<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE131"> </a></td><td>Partner HIV test date</td><td><div><p>Date of client's partner's HIV test</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE132<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE132"> </a></td><td>Partner HIV test result</td><td><div><p>The HIV test result of the client's partner</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE133<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE133"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>Test result is HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE134<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE134"> </a></td><td>HIV-negative</td><td><div><p>Test result is HIV-negative</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE135<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE135"> </a></td><td>HIV-inconclusive</td><td><div><p>Test result is HIV-inconclusive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE136<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE136"> </a></td><td>Partner HIV status (confirmed)</td><td><div><p>The HIV status of a sexual or drug-injecting partner of the client, based on a confirmed test result</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE137<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE137"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>Client's partner is HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE138<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE138"> </a></td><td>HIV-negative</td><td><div><p>Client's partner is HIV-negative</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE139<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE139"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>Client's partner HIV status is unknown</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE140<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE140"> </a></td><td>Partner on ART</td><td><div><p>Partner of the client is on ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE141<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE141"> </a></td><td>Partner virally suppressed on ART</td><td><div><p>ART and virally suppression status of a partner of the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE142<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE142"> </a></td><td>Counselling provided</td><td><div><p>Whether counselling was provided to a client during the visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE143<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE143"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive counselling conducted</td><td><div><p>Whether counselling was provided to a client who has been diagnosed with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.B.DE144<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46B.46DE144"> </a></td><td>Hepatitis B positive counselling conducted</td><td><div><p>Whether counselling was provided to a client who has been diagnosed with hepatitis B</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE3<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE3"> </a></td><td>Follow-up appointment for PrEP or PEP</td><td><div><p>Client is at a follow-up or refill pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) appointment</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE7<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE7"> </a></td><td>3-month PrEP visit</td><td><div><p>Client is visiting for the recommended 3-month pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE8<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE8"> </a></td><td>Contact with and (suspected) exposure to HIV</td><td><div><p>The client had suspected or known exposure to HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE9<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE9"> </a></td><td>Date/time of suspected exposure to HIV</td><td><div><p>When the suspect exposure to HIV took place</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE10<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE10"> </a></td><td>Currently on PrEP</td><td><div><p>The client is currently taking PrEP. Oral pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) of HIV is the use of ARV drugs by people who are not infected with HIV to block the acquisition of HIV.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE11<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE11"> </a></td><td>PrEP dosing type</td><td><div><p>Way in which pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) is taken (daily or event-driven)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE12<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE12"> </a></td><td>Daily oral PrEP</td><td><div><p>Pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) is taken every day</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE13<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE13"> </a></td><td>Event-driven PrEP (2+1+1)</td><td><div><p>Event-driven pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) is taken on an even-driven basis (2+1+1)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE14<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE14"> </a></td><td>Other PrEP dosing type</td><td><div><p>Other PrEP dosing type</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE15<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE15"> </a></td><td>Other PrEP dosing type (specify)</td><td><div><p>Other PrEP dosing type (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE16<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE16"> </a></td><td>Used event-driven PrEP for at risk exposures over the past 3 months</td><td><div><p>Client reports taking ED-PrEP for at risk exposures over a 3-month period</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE17<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE17"> </a></td><td>Current PrEP regimen</td><td><div><p>HIV pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) regimen</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE18<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE18"> </a></td><td>TDF + FTC</td><td><div><p>Treated with tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF) and emtricitabine (FTC) pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) regimen (oral PrEP)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE19<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE19"> </a></td><td>TDF</td><td><div><p>Treated with single-agent tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF) pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) regimen (oral PrEP)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE20<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE20"> </a></td><td>TDF + 3TC</td><td><div><p>Treated with tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF) and lamivudine (3TC) pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) regimen (oral PrEP)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE21<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE21"> </a></td><td>Other TDF-based regimen</td><td><div><p>Treated with other tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF)-based regimen (oral PrEP)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE22<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE22"> </a></td><td>Dapivirine vaginal ring (DVR)</td><td><div><p>Dapivirine vaginal ring (DVR) for HIV prevention</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE23<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE23"> </a></td><td>CAB-LA</td><td><div><p>Long-acting injectable cabotegravir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE24<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE24"> </a></td><td>Experience with PrEP</td><td><div><p>The client's experience in taking PrEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE25<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE25"> </a></td><td>First-time user</td><td><div><p>The client has never used pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) before (naive)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE26<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE26"> </a></td><td>Continuing user</td><td><div><p>The client has used PrEP before and is continuing to use PrEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE27<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE27"> </a></td><td>Restarting following a period of not taking PrEP</td><td><div><p>The client is restarting PrEP following a period of not taking PrEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE28<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE28"> </a></td><td>PrEP start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client started or restarted pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE29<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE29"> </a></td><td>Stopped PrEP</td><td><div><p>Client stopped taking pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE30<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE30"> </a></td><td>Date PrEP stopped</td><td><div><p>Date client stopped taking pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE31<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE31"> </a></td><td>PEP history</td><td><div><p>The client's history in taking post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) for HIV prevention</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE32<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE32"> </a></td><td>First-time user</td><td><div><p>The client has never used post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) before</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE33<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE33"> </a></td><td>Repeat user</td><td><div><p>The client has used post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) before</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE34<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE34"> </a></td><td>Date(s) of past PEP use</td><td><div><p>Dates when the client previously used post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE35<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE35"> </a></td><td>Date client completes PEP course</td><td><div><p>Date client completes PEP course</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE36<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE36"> </a></td><td>Signs of substantial risk of HIV infection</td><td><div><p>Signs the client is at a substantial risk of HIV infection</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE37<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE37"> </a></td><td>No condom use during sex with more than one partner in the past 6 months</td><td><div><p>Recent vaginal or anal sexual intercourse without a condom with more than one partner</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE38<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE38"> </a></td><td>STI in the past 6 months</td><td><div><p>A recent history (in the last 6 months) of a sexually transmitted infection (STI ) by laboratory testing, self-report or syndromic STI treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE39<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE39"> </a></td><td>A sexual partner in the past 6 months had one or more HIV risk factors</td><td><div><p>A recent sex partner of the client had HIV risk factors</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE40<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE40"> </a></td><td>PrEP requested by client</td><td><div><p>Client is requesting PrEP, reflecting a decision-making process has already taken place and suggesting of substantial risk of HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE41<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE41"> </a></td><td>Pregnancy intention in serodiscordant partnerships</td><td><div><p>Client's intention or desire in the next year to either become pregnant or prevent a future pregnancy (in serodiscordant partnerships)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE42<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE42"> </a></td><td>Yes, I want to become pregnant</td><td><div><p>Client intends to become pregnant</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE43<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE43"> </a></td><td>I'm OK either way</td><td><div><p>Client is not intending to become pregnant, but would not be adverse to becoming pregnant</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE44<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE44"> </a></td><td>No, I don't want to become pregnant</td><td><div><p>Client does not intend to become pregnant</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE45<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE45"> </a></td><td>Unsure</td><td><div><p>Client is unsure or undecided about her pregnancy intentions</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE46<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE46"> </a></td><td>Acute HIV infection symptoms</td><td><div><p>Symptoms that could suggest an acute HIV infection</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE47<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE47"> </a></td><td>Fever</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include a fever</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE48<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE48"> </a></td><td>Sore throat</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include a sore throat</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE49<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE49"> </a></td><td>Aches</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include aches</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE50<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE50"> </a></td><td>Pains</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include pains</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE51<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE51"> </a></td><td>Swollen glands</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include swollen glands</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE52<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE52"> </a></td><td>Mouth sores</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include a mouth sores</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE53<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE53"> </a></td><td>Headaches</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include a headaches</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE54<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE54"> </a></td><td>Rash</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include a rash</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE55<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE55"> </a></td><td>Sex partner's HIV treatment status</td><td><div><p>Treatment adherence of client's sex partner for partners that are HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE56<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE56"> </a></td><td>Not on ART</td><td><div><p>Sex partner is HIV-positive and not on ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE57<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE57"> </a></td><td>On ART less than 6 months</td><td><div><p>Sex partner is HIV-positive and is on ART less than 6 months. ART may take up to 6 months to suppress viral load. In studies of serodiscordant couples, pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) has provided a useful bridge to full viral suppression by the partner during that time.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE58<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE58"> </a></td><td>Partner has suspected low adherence to ART</td><td><div><p>Sex partner is HIV-positive and is suspected to have low adherence to ART. There have been gaps in the partner's treatment adherence or the couple is not communicating openly about treatment adherence and viral load test results.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE59<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE59"> </a></td><td>Partner is not virally suppressed</td><td><div><p>Sex partner is HIV-positive and not virally suppressed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE60<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE60"> </a></td><td>Partner is virally suppressed and has been on ART for 6 months or more</td><td><div><p>Sex partner is HIV-positive and virally suppressed with 6 months or more on ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE61<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE61"> </a></td><td>Suitable for PrEP</td><td><div><p>The client is suitable for PrEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE62<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE62"> </a></td><td>Offered PrEP</td><td><div><p>After being evaluated as suitable for PrEP, the client was offered PrEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE63<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE63"> </a></td><td>Screenings and diagnostics for PrEP users</td><td><div><p>Listing of tests for clients on or starting pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) that may be recommended or should be considered</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE64<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE64"> </a></td><td>Serum creatinine test</td><td><div><p>Test serum creatinine to identify pre-existing renal disease (estimated creatinine clearance less than 60 ml/min)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE65<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE65"> </a></td><td>Hepatitis B test</td><td><div><p>Hepatitis B test recommended for client</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE68<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE68"> </a></td><td>Other screening for STIs</td><td><div><p>Other STI screening recommended for client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE69<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE69"> </a></td><td>Pregnancy testing</td><td><div><p>Pregnancy testing for client</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE71<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE71"> </a></td><td>Serum creatinine test date</td><td><div><p>Test serum creatinine to identify pre-existing renal disease (estimated creatinine clearance less than 60 ml/min)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE72<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE72"> </a></td><td>Serum creatinine test result</td><td><div><p>Test serum creatinine to identify pre-existing renal disease (estimated creatinine clearance less than 60 ml/min).</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE73<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE73"> </a></td><td>Date medications dispensed</td><td><div><p>Date the client was dispensed medications</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE74<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE74"> </a></td><td>Date medications prescribed</td><td><div><p>Date the client was prescribed medications</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE75<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE75"> </a></td><td>Medications prescribed</td><td><div><p>Medications the client was prescribed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE76<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE76"> </a></td><td>PrEP for HIV prevention</td><td><div><p>Client was prescribed pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) for HIV prevention</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE82<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE82"> </a></td><td>Dapivirine vaginal ring (DVR)</td><td><div><p>Client was prescribed dapivirine vaginal ring (DVR)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE83<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE83"> </a></td><td>CAB-LA</td><td><div><p>Client was prescribed long-acting cabotegravir (CAB-LA)</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE90<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE90"> </a></td><td>Date PEP course completion</td><td><div><p>Date client completes PEP course</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE91<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE91"> </a></td><td>Preferred PEP backbone regimen</td><td><div><p>Preferred backbone regimen for PEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE92<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE92"> </a></td><td>TDF + 3TC</td><td><div><p>Preferred backbone containing tenofovir disoproxil fumarate and lamivudine</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE93<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE93"> </a></td><td>TDF + FTC</td><td><div><p>Preferred backbone containing tenofovir disoproxil fumarate and emtricitabine</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE94<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE94"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC</td><td><div><p>Preferred backbone containing zidovudine and lamivudine</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE95<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE95"> </a></td><td>Alternative PEP backbone regimen</td><td><div><p>Alternative backbone regimen for PEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE96<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE96"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC</td><td><div><p>Alternative backbone containing abacavir and lamivudine</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE97<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE97"> </a></td><td>TDF + 3TC</td><td><div><p>Alternative backbone containing tenofovir disoproxil fumarate and lamivudine</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE98<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE98"> </a></td><td>TDF + FTC</td><td><div><p>Alternative backbone containing tenofovir disoproxil fumarate and emtricitabine</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE99<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE99"> </a></td><td>Preferred third PEP drug</td><td><div><p>Preferred third drug for PEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE100<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE100"> </a></td><td>DTG</td><td><div><p>Preferred third drug of dolutegravir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE101<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE101"> </a></td><td>Alternative third PEP drug</td><td><div><p>Alternative third drug for PEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE102<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE102"> </a></td><td>ATV/r</td><td><div><p>Alternative third drug of atazanavir/ritonavir (ATV/r)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE103<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE103"> </a></td><td>DRV/r</td><td><div><p>Alternative third drug of darunavir/ritonavir (DRV/r)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE104<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE104"> </a></td><td>LPV/r</td><td><div><p>Alternative third drug of lopinavir/ritonavir (LPV/r)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE105<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE105"> </a></td><td>RAL</td><td><div><p>Alternative third drug of raltegravir (RAL)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE106<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE106"> </a></td><td>Estimated creatinine clearance</td><td><div><p>Estimated creatinine clearance of the client returned from lab in mL/min</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE107<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE107"> </a></td><td>Sex factor for estimating creatinine clearance</td><td><div><p>Value used for gender for calculating creatinine clearance if required. For transgender populations, the sex at birth is used in the Cockcroft-Gault equation if the person is not using hormone therapy; among transgender populations using hormone therapy for more than three months, the current gender can be used.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE108<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE108"> </a></td><td>Male</td><td><div><p>Male client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE109<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE109"> </a></td><td>Female</td><td><div><p>Female client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE110<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE110"> </a></td><td>Estimated creatinine clearance (Cockcroft–Gault equation)</td><td><div><p>If the laboratory does not have the capacity to estimate creatinine clearance, the provider can use the Cockcroft–Gault equation to calculate estimated creatinine clearance based on measured serum creatinine, the client’s sex at birth, age and estimated lean body weight.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE111<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE111"> </a></td><td>Date of sample collection</td><td><div><p>Date when the specimen was collected</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE112<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE112"> </a></td><td>Contraindications to PrEP usage</td><td><div><p>Listing of contraindications to pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE113<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE113"> </a></td><td>Tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF) allergy or contraindication</td><td><div><p>Allergy to pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE114<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE114"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>Client is HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE115<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE115"> </a></td><td>Low estimated creatinine clearance</td><td><div><p>Estimated creatinine clearance of less than 60 ml/min (if known)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE116<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE116"> </a></td><td>Acute HIV infection symptoms</td><td><div><p>Symptoms that could suggest an acute HIV infection</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE117<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE117"> </a></td><td>Probable recent exposure to HIV</td><td><div><p>When the client is reported to have had probable recent exposure to HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE118<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE118"> </a></td><td>Other allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the PrEP regimen</td><td><div><p>Client has another allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) regimen</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE119<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE119"> </a></td><td>Other allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the PrEP regimen (specify)</td><td><div><p>Client has another allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) regimen (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE120<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE120"> </a></td><td>Prescribed PrEP at initial visit</td><td><div><p>Client was prescribed pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) on a first visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE121<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE121"> </a></td><td>Number of days prescribed</td><td><div><p>Days of medication client has been prescribed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE122<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE122"> </a></td><td>PrEP regimen prescribed</td><td><div><p>HIV pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) regimen prescribed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE123<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE123"> </a></td><td>Adherence counselling provided</td><td><div><p>Whether adherence counselling was provided</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE124<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE124"> </a></td><td>Date/time of follow-up appointment</td><td><div><p>Date the client is to return for monitoring, re-supply, or any other reason</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE125<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE125"> </a></td><td>Type of follow-up appointment</td><td><div><p>Type of follow-up appointment for testing services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE126<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE126"> </a></td><td>Retesting for HIV</td><td><div><p>Retesting follow-up appointment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE127<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE127"> </a></td><td>Follow-up appointment for PrEP</td><td><div><p>Retesting follow-up appointment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE128<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE128"> </a></td><td>Other</td><td><div><p>Other reason for the follow-up appointment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE129<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE129"> </a></td><td>Other (specify)</td><td><div><p>Other reason for the follow-up appointment (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE130<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE130"> </a></td><td>Linked to enrolment in care and ART initiation</td><td><div><p>Linkage made from HIV testing to enrolment in care following an HIV diagnosis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE131<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE131"> </a></td><td>Prevention services offered and referrals</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer to prevention services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE132<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE132"> </a></td><td>Male and female condoms and condom-compatible lubricants offered</td><td><div><p>Offer male and female condoms and condom-compatible lubricants</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE133<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE133"> </a></td><td>Voluntary medical male circumcision (VMMC) referral</td><td><div><p>Offer referral for VMMC services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE134<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE134"> </a></td><td>Harm reduction for people who inject drugs</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer to harm reduction for people who inject drugs (needle and syringe programmes, opioid substitution therapy, other drug-dependence treatment and opioid overdose prevention and management) services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE135<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE135"> </a></td><td>Behavioural interventions to support risk reduction</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer to services for behavioural interventions to support risk reduction, particularly for people with HIV and members of key populations</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE136<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE136"> </a></td><td>Date provided condoms</td><td><div><p>Date client was provided with condoms</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE137<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE137"> </a></td><td>Condoms distributed</td><td><div><p>Number of condoms given to the client, if any were distributed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE138<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE138"> </a></td><td>Condom type</td><td><div><p>Type of condom provided to client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE139<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE139"> </a></td><td>Male condom</td><td><div><p>Male condoms were provided to the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE140<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE140"> </a></td><td>Female condom</td><td><div><p>Female condoms were provided to the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE141<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE141"> </a></td><td>HIV self-test kits accepted</td><td><div><p>Whether any HIV self-test kits were given to the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE142<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE142"> </a></td><td>Number of HIV self-test kits distributed</td><td><div><p>Number of HIV self-test kits distributed to the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE143<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE143"> </a></td><td>HIV self-test distributed for use by</td><td><div><p>Whom the client plans to give the HIV self-test kit (self, sexual partner, social contact, etc.)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE144<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE144"> </a></td><td>Self</td><td><div><p>Client plans to use the self-test kit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE145<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE145"> </a></td><td>Family member</td><td><div><p>Client plans to give the self-test kit to a family member to use</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE152<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE152"> </a></td><td>Prevent mother-to-child transmission</td><td><div><p>Offer services (counselling) to help prevent of mother-to-child transmission</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE153<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE153"> </a></td><td>Cervical cancer screening and treatment</td><td><div><p>Offer cervical cancer screening and treatment services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE154<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE154"> </a></td><td>Anal cancer screening (for men who have sex with men)</td><td><div><p>Offer anal cancer screening (for men who have sex with men) services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE155<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE155"> </a></td><td>STI testing and treatment</td><td><div><p>Offer STI testing and treatment services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE156<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE156"> </a></td><td>HIV testing for partners and biological children</td><td><div><p>Offer testing for all partners and biological children of positive cases (includes partner services and index case testing), as well as partners and social contacts of people from key populations, where appropriate</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE157<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE157"> </a></td><td>Offer other clinical services</td><td><div><p>Other clinical services offered or referrals given to the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE158<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE158"> </a></td><td>Assessment and provision of vaccinations</td><td><div><p>Assessment and provision of vaccinations, such as for people from key populations, pregnant women and infants; and, where appropriate, tetanus vaccination for adolescent boys and men receiving VMMC</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE159<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE159"> </a></td><td>Hepatitis B virus (HBV) and hepatitis C virus (HCV) testing and treatment</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for HBV testing and vaccination and HCV testing and treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE160<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE160"> </a></td><td>Co-trimoxazole chemoprophylaxis to prevent pneumocystis carinii pneumonia</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for co-trimoxazole chemoprophylaxis to prevent pneumocystis carinii pneumonia</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE161<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE161"> </a></td><td>Intensified TB case finding and linkage to TB treatment</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for TB case finding and linkage to TB treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE162<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE162"> </a></td><td>Provision of isoniazid preventive therapy if person does not have TB</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for provision of isoniazid preventive therapy if person does not have TB</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE163<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE163"> </a></td><td>Malaria prevention (such as bed nets and prophylaxis), depending on epidemiology</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for malaria prevention (such as bed nets and prophylaxis), depending on epidemiology</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE164<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE164"> </a></td><td>Other support services</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for other support services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE165<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE165"> </a></td><td>Mental health services</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for mental health services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE166<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE166"> </a></td><td>Psychosocial counselling, support and treatment adherence counselling</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for psychosocial counselling, support and treatment adherence counselling</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE167<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE167"> </a></td><td>Support for disclosure and partner services</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for support for disclosure and partner services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE168<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE168"> </a></td><td>Legal and social services</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for legal and social services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.C.DE169<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46C.46DE169"> </a></td><td>Services for responding to violence against women</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for services for responding to violence against women, including first-line support and psychosocial support, post-rape care and other support services including shelters, legal services and women and child protection services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1"> </a></td><td>Reason for visit</td><td><div><p>Whether visit was scheduled or unscheduled, clinical only, or for ARV drug pick-up</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE2<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE2"> </a></td><td>First clinical visit</td><td><div><p>The client's first appointment for clinical care by a provider at the facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE3<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE3"> </a></td><td>Clinical visit</td><td><div><p>Appointment for clinical care by a provider</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE4<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE4"> </a></td><td>ART initiation</td><td><div><p>Appointment for initiation of ART</p>
