</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE6<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE6"> </a></td><td>Issues and concerns</td><td><div><p>Visit to address issues and concerns</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE7<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE7"> </a></td><td>Post-treatment follow-up visit for cervical precancer lesions or invasive cervical cancer</td><td><div><p>Appointment for a post-treatment follow-up visit for cervical precancer lesions or invasive cervical cancer</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE8<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE8"> </a></td><td>Scheduled visit</td><td><div><p>Is this is a scheduled visit?</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE9<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE9"> </a></td><td>Body temperature</td><td><div><p>Temperature of the client in Celsius</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE10<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE10"> </a></td><td>Respiratory rate</td><td><div><p>The number of breaths per minute</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE11<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE11"> </a></td><td>Heart rate</td><td><div><p>The number of heartbeats per minute</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE12<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE12"> </a></td><td>Body height</td><td><div><p>The client's height in centimetres</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE13<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE13"> </a></td><td>Body weight</td><td><div><p>The client's current weight in kilograms</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE14<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE14"> </a></td><td>Systolic blood pressure</td><td><div><p>Systolic blood pressure (SBP) in mmHg</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE15<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE15"> </a></td><td>Diastolic blood pressure</td><td><div><p>Diastolic blood pressure (DBP) in mmHg</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE16<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE16"> </a></td><td>Blood pressure cannot be taken</td><td><div><p>If the client's blood pressure cannot be taken, this should be indicated here. Otherwise, blood pressure should be measured.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE17<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE17"> </a></td><td>Signs of serious illness</td><td><div><p>Signs that may indicate the client has a serious illness and needs triage or an emergency referral</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE18<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE18"> </a></td><td>Fever of 39 C or greater</td><td><div><p>Client has a fever with a measured temperature of 102.2 F/39 C or greater</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE19<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE19"> </a></td><td>Tachycardia</td><td><div><p>Heart rate above a rate per minute based on age</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE20<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE20"> </a></td><td>Tachypnea</td><td><div><p>Respiratory rate above a number of breaths per minute based on age</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE21<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE21"> </a></td><td>Unable to walk unaided</td><td><div><p>Client is not able to walk without help</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE22<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE22"> </a></td><td>Lethargy</td><td><div><p>Client is exhibiting lethargy as a sign of serious illness</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE23<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE23"> </a></td><td>Unconsciousness</td><td><div><p>Client is currently unconscious</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE24<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE24"> </a></td><td>Convulsions</td><td><div><p>Client is convulsing</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE25<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE25"> </a></td><td>Unable to drink</td><td><div><p>Child is not able to drink</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE26<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE26"> </a></td><td>Unable to breastfeed</td><td><div><p>Infant or child is not able to breastfeed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE27<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE27"> </a></td><td>Repeated vomiting</td><td><div><p>Client is repeatedly vomiting</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE28<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE28"> </a></td><td>Headache</td><td><div><p>Client is exhibiting a headache</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE29<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE29"> </a></td><td>Other sign of serious illness</td><td><div><p>Client is exhibiting another sign of a serious illness</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE30<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE30"> </a></td><td>Other sign of serious illness (specify)</td><td><div><p>Client is exhibiting another sign of a serious illness (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE31<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE31"> </a></td><td>Currently pregnant</td><td><div><p>Client is currently pregnant</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE32<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE32"> </a></td><td>Breastfeeding</td><td><div><p>Client is giving infant breast milk</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE33<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE33"> </a></td><td>Number of pregnancies (gravida)</td><td><div><p>Total number of times the woman has been pregnant (gravida)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE34<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE34"> </a></td><td>Number of miscarriages and/or abortions</td><td><div><p>Total number of pregnancies lost/ended due to miscarriages and/or abortions before 22 weeks/5 months</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE35<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE35"> </a></td><td>Number of live births</td><td><div><p>Total number of live births after 22 weeks</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE36<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE36"> </a></td><td>Parity</td><td><div><p>Calculated parity is the total number of live and stillbirths</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE37<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE37"> </a></td><td>Serodiscordant partner</td><td><div><p>Client's HIV status is different from a current partner's HIV status</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE38<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE38"> </a></td><td>On ART</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE39<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE39"> </a></td><td>ART start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client started or restarted ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE40<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE40"> </a></td><td>Stopped ART</td><td><div><p>Client stopped taking ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE41<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE41"> </a></td><td>Date ART stopped</td><td><div><p>Date on which client stopped ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE42<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE42"> </a></td><td>Established on ART</td><td><div><p>Is the client successfully established on ART?</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE43<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE43"> </a></td><td>ART start type</td><td><div><p>Whether the client is ART naive or is restarting ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE44<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE44"> </a></td><td>First-time user of ART</td><td><div><p>Client is ART naive, having never taken ART to treat HIV before</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE45<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE45"> </a></td><td>Restarting ART</td><td><div><p>Client is restarting ART after stopping treatment for any reason</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE46<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE46"> </a></td><td>Date of initiation on ART</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client was first initiated on ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE47<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE47"> </a></td><td>Time on ART</td><td><div><p>Time the client has been on ART since starting or restarting it in years and months</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE48<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE48"> </a></td><td>Date(s) ART restarted</td><td><div><p>Date(s) client restarted ART after stopping (intentionally interrupting) for any number of reasons (see 'Reason ART stopped')</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE49<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE49"> </a></td><td>ART cohort</td><td><div><p>Month and year client originally started ART (documented) at a health facility in the system. The cohort is a group of patients who started ART in the same month (or quarter) and year, whose status is followed over time, using the ART register.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE50<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE50"> </a></td><td>Transfer in for HIV care</td><td><div><p>Client is transferring in with records or known ART drugs and ART start date</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE51<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE51"> </a></td><td>Date of transfer in</td><td><div><p>Date client presented at facility (with transfer/referral slip) from another facility (and on ART) within the system</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE52<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE52"> </a></td><td>Facility transferred from</td><td><div><p>Name of health facility client was transferred from</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE53<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE53"> </a></td><td>Date enrolled in HIV care</td><td><div><p>Date client first enrols in HIV care at the facility. Begins when a person with a confirmed HIV diagnosis presents to a facility where HIV care is provided and a medical record, patient card, file or chart is opened for the first time. This could be at an HIV care/ART, MNCH or TB clinic.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE54<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE54"> </a></td><td>Age at enrolment</td><td><div><p>Client's age when the client was enrolled in ART care</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE55<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE55"> </a></td><td>Facility where client first enrolled in HIV care</td><td><div><p>Facility where the client first enrolled in HIV care</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE56<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE56"> </a></td><td>Antiretroviral (ARV) drugs received prior to enrolment</td><td><div><p>Whether or not the client received ARV drugs prior to enrolling into HIV care</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE57<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE57"> </a></td><td>No prior ARVs</td><td><div><p>Client received no prior ARVs</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE58<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE58"> </a></td><td>Received ARVs prior without records/documentation</td><td><div><p>Client received ARVs prior without records/documentation</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE59<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE59"> </a></td><td>Received ARVs during pregnancy or breastfeeding</td><td><div><p>Client received ARVs during pregnancy or breastfeeding</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE60<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE60"> </a></td><td>Received ARVs for PEP or PrEP</td><td><div><p>Client received ARVs for post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) or PrEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE61<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE61"> </a></td><td>ARV prophylaxis for an HIV-exposed infant</td><td><div><p>Client received ARV prophylaxis for an HIV-exposed infant</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE62<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE62"> </a></td><td>Date ARV drugs received prior to enrolment</td><td><div><p>Date ARV drugs were started prior to enrolment into HIV care/ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE63<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE63"> </a></td><td>Location ARV drugs received prior to enrolment</td><td><div><p>Health facility (or other location) where ARV drugs were received prior to enrolment into HIV care/ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE64<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE64"> </a></td><td>ARV drug regimen received prior to enrolment</td><td><div><p>ARV drug regimen received prior to enrolment into HIV care/ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE65<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE65"> </a></td><td>Existing chronic health conditions</td><td><div><p>Does the client have any current chronic health conditions or problems?</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE66<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE66"> </a></td><td>No chronic or past health conditions</td><td><div><p>Client does not have chronic diseases or any past health conditions</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE67<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE67"> </a></td><td>Don't know</td><td><div><p>Client does not know whether she has any chronic diseases or past health conditions</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE68<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE68"> </a></td><td>Diabetes other or unspecified</td><td><div><p>Client has diabetes of other or unspecified type</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE69<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE69"> </a></td><td>Diabetes pre-existing type 1</td><td><div><p>Client has pre-existing type 1 diabetes mellitus</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE70<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE70"> </a></td><td>Diabetes pre-existing type 2</td><td><div><p>Client has pre-existing type 2 diabetes mellitus</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE71<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE71"> </a></td><td>Hypertension</td><td><div><p>High blood pressure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE72<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE72"> </a></td><td>Other</td><td><div><p>Other health conditions not included in the list</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE73<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE73"> </a></td><td>Other (specify)</td><td><div><p>Other health conditions not included in the list (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE74<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE74"> </a></td><td>Original first-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>Original full, first-line ARV drug regimen patient started on at this facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE75<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE75"> </a></td><td>Current ART regimen</td><td><div><p>The current ART regimen the client is taking</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE76<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE76"> </a></td><td>Current ART regimen start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client started taking the current ART regimen</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE77<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE77"> </a></td><td>Preferred first-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>The preferred first-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE78<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE78"> </a></td><td>Alternative first-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>The alternative first-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE79<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE79"> </a></td><td>First-line ART regimen under special circumstances</td><td><div><p>The first-line ART regimen for the client under special circumstances according to WHO (or national) guidelines</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE80<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE80"> </a></td><td>Preferred second-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>The preferred second-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE81<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE81"> </a></td><td>Alternative second-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>The alternative second-line ART regimen for the client according to WHO (or national) guidelines</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE82<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE82"> </a></td><td>Optimal regimen for transition</td><td><div><p>The optimal regimen for transition to DTG-based regimens for children established on ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE83<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE83"> </a></td><td>Current ART regimen (first-, second-, or third-line)</td><td><div><p>ART regimen for treating clients living with HIV, based on national guidance</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE84<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE84"> </a></td><td>First-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents</td><td><div><p>First-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents living with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE85<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE85"> </a></td><td>First-line ART regimen for children</td><td><div><p>First-line ART regimen for children living with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE86<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE86"> </a></td><td>First-line ART regimen for neonates</td><td><div><p>First-line ART regimen for neonates living with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE87<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE87"> </a></td><td>Second-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents</td><td><div><p>Second-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents living with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE88<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE88"> </a></td><td>Second-line ART regimen for children</td><td><div><p>Second-line ART regimen for children living with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE89<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE89"> </a></td><td>Third-line ART regimen</td><td><div><p>Third-line ART regimen for people living with HIV (Not defined by WHO. National programmes should develop policies for third-line ART)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE90<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE90"> </a></td><td>ART regimen</td><td><div><p>List of ART regimens</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE91<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE91"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + ATV/r</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and atazanavir/ritonavir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE92<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE92"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + DTG</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and dolutegravir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE93<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE93"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + EFV</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and efavarinez</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE94<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE94"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + LPV/r</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and lopinavir/ritonavir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE95<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE95"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + NVP</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and nevirapine</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE96<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE96"> </a></td><td>ABC + 3TC + RAL</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing abacavir, lamivudine, and raltegravir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE97<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE97"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + ATV/r</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and atazanavir/ritonavir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE98<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE98"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + DRV/r</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and darunavir/ritonavir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE99<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE99"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + DTG</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and dolutegravir</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE100<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE100"> </a></td><td>AZT + 3TC + EFV</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing zidovudine, lamivudine, and efavirenz</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE124<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE124"> </a></td><td>TDF + FTC + PI/r</td><td><div><p>Regimen containing tenofovir disoproxil fumarate, emtricitabine, and a boosted protease inhibitor</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE185<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE185"> </a></td><td>Currently on TDF-based ART</td><td><div><p>Client is currently on TDF-based ART regimen</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE186<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE186"> </a></td><td>HIV clinical stage</td><td><div><p>WHO clinical stage of client based on signs and symptoms. WHO clinical staging is a way to categorize HIV disease severity based on new or recurrent clinical events. There are 4 WHO clinical stages that range from mild symptoms (WHO clinical stage 1) to severe symptoms (WHO clinical stage 4).</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE187<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE187"> </a></td><td>WHO HIV clinical stage 1</td><td><div><p>Client is currently assessed to be at a clinical stage 1, based on clinical assessment and diagnostics</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE188<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE188"> </a></td><td>WHO HIV clinical stage 2</td><td><div><p>Client is currently assessed to be at a clinical stage 2, based on clinical assessment and diagnostics</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE189<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE189"> </a></td><td>WHO HIV clinical stage 3</td><td><div><p>Client is currently assessed to be at a clinical stage 3, based on clinical assessment and diagnostics</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE190<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE190"> </a></td><td>WHO HIV clinical stage 4</td><td><div><p>Client is currently assessed to be at a clinical stage 4, based on clinical assessment and diagnostics</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE223<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE223"> </a></td><td>Other reason for stopping ART</td><td><div><p>Client stopped ART because of other reason</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE224<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE224"> </a></td><td>Other reason for stopping ART (specify)</td><td><div><p>Client stopped ART because of other reason (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE225<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE225"> </a></td><td>Treatment failure</td><td><div><p>ART treatment failure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE226<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE226"> </a></td><td>Clinical failure</td><td><div><p>New or recurrent clinical event indicating severe immunodeficiency in adults or advanced or severe immunodeficiency in children</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE227<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE227"> </a></td><td>Immunological failure</td><td><div><p>CD4 count at or below 250 cells/mm3 following clinical failure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE228<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE228"> </a></td><td>Virological failure</td><td><div><p>The inability to achieve or maintain viral suppression below a certain threshold indicated by viral load above 1000 copies/mL based on two consecutive viral load measurements in 3 months, with adherence support following the first viral load test</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE229<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE229"> </a></td><td>General care activities recommended</td><td><div><p>General care activities to be performed during the care visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE230<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE230"> </a></td><td>Determine WHO clinical stage</td><td><div><p>Determine WHO clinical stage based on past and current HIV-related conditions</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE231<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE231"> </a></td><td>Determine if advanced disease</td><td><div><p>Determine if client is in an advanced stage of HIV, as a special package of services may be provided</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE232<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE232"> </a></td><td>Prepare for ART</td><td><div><p>Prepare client new to ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE233<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE233"> </a></td><td>Prepare, assess and support adherence</td><td><div><p>Prepare, assess and support adherence</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE235<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE235"> </a></td><td>Check pregnancy status</td><td><div><p>Check woman's pregnancy status</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE236<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE236"> </a></td><td>Provide family planning and contraception</td><td><div><p>Provide family planning and contraception counselling</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE246<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE246"> </a></td><td>Provide support on infant and child feeding</td><td><div><p>Provide support on infant and child feeding to mother or care giver</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE258<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE258"> </a></td><td>Assessment and provision of vaccinations</td><td><div><p>Assessment and provision of vaccinations, such as for people from key populations, pregnant women and infants; and, where appropriate, tetanus vaccination for adolescent boys and men receiving VMMC</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE259<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE259"> </a></td><td>Risk factors, comorbidities and coinfections signs and symptoms</td><td><div><p>Signs and symptoms of opportunistic infections or other comorbidities experienced by client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE260<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE260"> </a></td><td>Oral candidiasis</td><td><div><p>Client's comorbidities or coinfections or symptoms of these include oral candidiasis (after the first 6-8 weeks of life)</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE289<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE289"> </a></td><td>WHO HIV clinical stage condition or symptom</td><td><div><p>New or recurrent clinical events used to categorize HIV disease severity based at baseline and follow up</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE290<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE290"> </a></td><td>Asymptomatic</td><td><div><p>No HIV-related symptoms reported and no clinical signs on examination</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE291<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE291"> </a></td><td>Persistent generalized lymphadenopathy</td><td><div><p>Persistent enlarged lymph nodes &gt;1 cm at two or more non-contiguous sites (excluding inguinal) without known cause</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE292<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE292"> </a></td><td>Moderate unexplained weight loss</td><td><div><p>Moderate unexplained weight loss (&lt;10% of presumed or measured body weight)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE293<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE293"> </a></td><td>Recurrent respiratory tract infections</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include recurrent respiratory tract infections including sinusitis, tonsillitis, otitis media or pharyngitis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE294<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE294"> </a></td><td>Unexplained persistent hepatosplenomegaly</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include unexplained persistent hepatosplenomegaly</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE295<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE295"> </a></td><td>Herpes zoster</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include herpes zoster</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE302<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE302"> </a></td><td>Extensive wart virus infection</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include extensive wart virus infection</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE303<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE303"> </a></td><td>Extensive molluscum contagiosum</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include extensive molluscum contagiosum</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE304<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE304"> </a></td><td>Unexplained persistent parotid enlargement</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include unexplained persistent parotid enlargement</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE305<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE305"> </a></td><td>Unexplained severe weight loss in adults</td><td><div><p>Unexplained severe weight loss (&gt;10% of presumed or measured body weight)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE306<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE306"> </a></td><td>Unexplained moderate malnutrition not adequately responding to standard therapy</td><td><div><p>Defined as weight-for-height &lt; - 2 z-score or mid-upper arm circumference 115 mm to &lt;125 mm. For children younger than five years of age: stunting is defined as severe acute malnutrition - either weight for height &lt; -3 z-score or mid-upper arm circumference &lt;115 mm or the presence of oedema.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE307<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE307"> </a></td><td>Unexplained chronic diarrhoea for longer than 1 month</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include unexplained chronic diarrhoea for longer than 1 month</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE308<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE308"> </a></td><td>Unexplained persistent diarrhoea (14 days or more)</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include unexplained persistent diarrhoea (14 days or more)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE309<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE309"> </a></td><td>Unexplained persistent fever (above 37.5 C, intermittent or constant, for longer than one 1 month)</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include unexplained persistent fever (above 37.5 C, intermittent or constant, for longer than one 1 month)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE310<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE310"> </a></td><td>Persistent oral candidiasis</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include persistent oral candidiasis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE311<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE311"> </a></td><td>Oral hairy leukoplakia</td><td><div><p>Client has fine white small linear or corrugated lesions on lateral borders of the tongue that do not scrape off</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE312<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE312"> </a></td><td>Pulmonary TB</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include pulmonary TB</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE313<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE313"> </a></td><td>Lymph node TB</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include lymph node TB</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE314<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE314"> </a></td><td>Severe bacterial infections (such as pneumonia, empyema, pyomyositis, bone or joint infection, meningitis, bacteraemia)</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include severe bacterial infections (such as pneumonia, empyema, pyomyositis, bone or joint infection, meningitis, bacteraemia)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE315<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE315"> </a></td><td>Severe recurrent bacterial pneumonia</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include severe recurrent bacterial pneumonia</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE317<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE317"> </a></td><td>Acute necrotizing ulcerative gingivitis</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include acute necrotizing ulcerative gingivitis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE318<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE318"> </a></td><td>Acute necrotizing ulcerative periodontitis</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include acute necrotizing ulcerative periodontitis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE319<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE319"> </a></td><td>Unexplained anaemia (&lt;8 g/dL)</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include unexplained anaemia (&lt;8 g/dL)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE320<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE320"> </a></td><td>Neutropaenia (&lt;0.5 x 10^9/L)</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include neutropaenia (&lt;0.5 x 10^9/L)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE321<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE321"> </a></td><td>Chronic thrombocytopaenia (&lt;50 x 10^9/L)</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include chronic thrombocytopaenia (&lt;50 x 10^9/L)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE322<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE322"> </a></td><td>Symptomatic lymphoid interstitial pneumonitis</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include symptomatic lymphoid interstitial pneumonitis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE323<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE323"> </a></td><td>Chronic HIV-associated lung disease, including bronchiectasis</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include chronic HIV-associated lung disease, including bronchiectasis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE324<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE324"> </a></td><td>HIV wasting syndrome</td><td><div><p>Unexplained involuntary weight loss (&gt;10% baseline body weight), with obvious wasting or body mass index &lt;18.5; PLUS EITHER unexplained chronic reported for longer than one month; OR reports of fever or night sweats for more than one month without other cause and lack of response to antibiotics or antimalarial agents; malaria must be excluded in malarious areas.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE325<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE325"> </a></td><td>Unexplained severe wasting not responding to standard therapy</td><td><div><p>Client has unexplained severe wasting not responding to standard therapy . For under 5 years old, defined as weight-for-height &lt; -3 z-score</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE326<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE326"> </a></td><td>Unexplained stunting not responding to standard therapy</td><td><div><p>Client has unexplained stunting not responding to standard therapy . For under 5 years old, defined as length-for- age/height-for-age &lt; -2 z-score</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE327<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE327"> </a></td><td>Unexplained severe malnutrition not responding to standard therapy</td><td><div><p>Client has unexplained severe malnutrition not responding to standard therapy . For under 5 years old, weight for height &lt; -3 z-score or mid-upper arm circumference &lt;115 mm or the presence of oedema</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE328<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE328"> </a></td><td>Pneumocystis (jirovecii) pneumonia</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include pneumocystis (jirovecii) pneumonia</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE369<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE369"> </a></td><td>Late ART initiation</td><td><div><p>Client had late ART initiation. That is, the client's first CD4 count from baseline CD4 test performed (such as at HIV diagnosis) was a count of &lt;200 cells/mm3</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE370<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE370"> </a></td><td>Reasons for delayed ART initiation</td><td><div><p>Reason why ART was not initiated at diagnosis or within 7 days of diagnosis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE371<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE371"> </a></td><td>Patient self-reported as not ready/willing</td><td><div><p>Client did not initiate ART at diagnosis or within 7 days of diagnosis because client self-reported as not ready/willing</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE372<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE372"> </a></td><td>Not completed education, support and preparation for ART</td><td><div><p>Client did not initiate ART at diagnosis or within 7 days of diagnosis because client had not completed education, support and preparation for ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE373<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE373"> </a></td><td>Fear of disclosure</td><td><div><p>Client did not initiate ART at diagnosis or within 7 days of diagnosis because of client's fear of disclosure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE374<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE374"> </a></td><td>Patient lacks finances</td><td><div><p>Client did not initiate ART at diagnosis or within 7 days of diagnosis because client lacks finances</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE388<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE388"> </a></td><td>Virally suppressed</td><td><div><p>The client is virally suppressed for HIV, based on the client's most recent viral load test result being less than 1000 copies/mL</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE389<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE389"> </a></td><td>Date viral load test results received</td><td><div><p>Date the viral load test result was received from the lab or completed in the facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE390<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE390"> </a></td><td>Viral load suppression date</td><td><div><p>Date on which the client tested as becoming virally suppressed, as indicated by a viral load test result under 1000 copies/mL</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE391<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE391"> </a></td><td>Reason for HIV viral load test</td><td><div><p>Whether the viral load is being tested for routine monitoring on a set schedule or for targeted monitoring for suspected treatment failure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE392<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE392"> </a></td><td>Routine viral load test</td><td><div><p>Routine refers to viral load tests obtained at standard intervals following ART initiation to monitor viral load response to ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE393<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE393"> </a></td><td>Targeted viral load monitoring</td><td><div><p>Targeted refers to viral load tests obtained based on a specific clinical indication (such as concern about disease progression or failure to respond to ART)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE394<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE394"> </a></td><td>Initial viral load test</td><td><div><p>The first viral load test of the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE395<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE395"> </a></td><td>Follow-up viral load test after receiving enhanced adherence counselling</td><td><div><p>A follow-up viral load test within 3-6 months after enhanced adherence counselling after client received a high viral load test result</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE396<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE396"> </a></td><td>Hepatitis B test required</td><td><div><p>Hepatitis B test is required</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE397<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE397"> </a></td><td>Hepatitis C test recommended</td><td><div><p>Hepatitis C test is recommended or should be considered</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE398<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE398"> </a></td><td>Syphilis test required</td><td><div><p>Syphilis test is required</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE399<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE399"> </a></td><td>Monitoring examinations</td><td><div><p>Name of examinations, test and results for any relevant investigations carried out for client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE400<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE400"> </a></td><td>Haemoglobin (Hb)</td><td><div><p>Provider ordered a Haemoglobin (Hb) test, number in g/dL test</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE401<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE401"> </a></td><td>Pregnancy test</td><td><div><p>Provider ordered a pregnancy test for client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE402<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE402"> </a></td><td>Syphilis test</td><td><div><p>Provider ordered a syphilis test</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE406<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE406"> </a></td><td>HIV viral load test ordered</td><td><div><p>Provider ordered an HIV viral load test</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE407<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE407"> </a></td><td>HIV viral load test scheduled</td><td><div><p>Scheduled an HIV viral load test with client</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE409<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE409"> </a></td><td>CD4 count test scheduled</td><td><div><p>Scheduled a CD4 test with client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE410<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE410"> </a></td><td>Cryptococcal antigen test</td><td><div><p>Provider ordered a cryptococcal antigen test</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE464<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE464"> </a></td><td>Frequency</td><td><div><p>Prescribed frequency for taking the medication</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE465<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE465"> </a></td><td>Adherence counselling provided</td><td><div><p>Counselling was carried out during visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE466<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE466"> </a></td><td>Type of treatment-limiting toxicity</td><td><div><p>Type of treatment-limiting toxicity experienced by client. Treatment-limiting toxicity is defined as a serious adverse drug reaction that results in drug discontinuation or substitution. In addition, any reaction that leads to treatment interruption or requires changing the drug or regimen because of an adverse drug reaction is also considered a serious adverse drug reaction.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE467<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE467"> </a></td><td>Gastrointestinal</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to GI issues (nausea, diarrhoea, abdominal pain, vomiting)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE468<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE468"> </a></td><td>Skin issues</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to skin issues (rash, hypersensitivity reaction)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE469<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE469"> </a></td><td>Peripheral neuropathy</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to peripheral neuropathy (burning/numbness/ tingling)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE470<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE470"> </a></td><td>Central nervous system symptoms</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to central nervous system symptoms (dizzy, anxiety, nightmare, depression, seizures)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE471<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE471"> </a></td><td>Weight gain</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to weight gain</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE472<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE472"> </a></td><td>Hepatic dysfunction</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to hepatic dysfunction (jaundice)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE473<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE473"> </a></td><td>Haematological disorders</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to haematological (anaemia, neutropenia) disorders</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE474<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE474"> </a></td><td>Fatigue</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to fatigue</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE475<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE475"> </a></td><td>Headache</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to headache</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE476<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE476"> </a></td><td>Bone dysfunction</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to bone dysfunction (fractures, osteopenia)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE477<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE477"> </a></td><td>Metabolic symptoms</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to metabolic symptoms (body fat changes, hyperglycaemia, dyslipidaemia)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE478<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE478"> </a></td><td>Kidney dysfunction</td><td><div><p>Treatment-limiting toxicity due to kidney dysfunction (nephrolithiasis, renal insufficiency)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE479<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE479"> </a></td><td>Unexpected adverse drug reaction</td><td><div><p>Client experienced an unexpected adverse drug reaction</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE480<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE480"> </a></td><td>Unexpected adverse drug reaction (specify)</td><td><div><p>Specify the type of unexpected adverse drug reaction the client experienced</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE481<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE481"> </a></td><td>Date(s) of substitution within first-line regimen</td><td><div><p>Date on which ARV drug regimen (one or more drugs) for client was changed within the first-line regimen (substitution)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE482<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE482"> </a></td><td>Reason(s) for substitution within first-line regimen</td><td><div><p>Reason(s) why one ore more drugs in client's first-line ARV drug regimen was changed (substituted)</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE506<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE506"> </a></td><td>Home-based care provider</td><td><div><p>Name of individual or organization that provides home-based care to client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE507<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE507"> </a></td><td>Counselling provided on diagnoses</td><td><div><p>Counselling provided on diagnoses</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE508<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE508"> </a></td><td>Hepatitis B positive counselling conducted</td><td><div><p>Whether counselling was provided to a client who has been diagnosed with hepatitis B</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE509<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE509"> </a></td><td>Hepatitis C positive counselling conducted</td><td><div><p>Whether counselling was provided to a client who has been diagnosed with hepatitis C</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE510<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE510"> </a></td><td>Syphilis counselling and treatment</td><td><div><p>Whether counselling and treatment was provided to a client who has been diagnosed with syphilis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE511<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE511"> </a></td><td>Syphilis counselling, treatment and further testing</td><td><div><p>Whether counselling and treatment was provided to a client who has been diagnosed with syphilis. Additional testing (RPR test) recommended.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE512<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE512"> </a></td><td>Accepted partner services</td><td><div><p>Client accepted offer for partner services</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE514<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE514"> </a></td><td>HIV status of family member</td><td><div><p>HIV status of each family member at time of patient's enrolment, including partner (for mothers)</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE522<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE522"> </a></td><td>Legal and social services</td><td><div><p>Offer or refer for legal and social services</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE524<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE524"> </a></td><td>Date/time of follow-up appointment</td><td><div><p>Date the client is to return for monitoring, re-supply or any other reason</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE569<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE569"> </a></td><td>Family planning method used</td><td><div><p>Method the client reports currently using at intake</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE570<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE570"> </a></td><td>Copper-bearing intrauterine device (Cu-IUD)</td><td><div><p>A copper-bearing intrauterine device is being used as a family planning method</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE571<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE571"> </a></td><td>Levonorgestrel intrauterine device (LNG-IUD)</td><td><div><p>A levonorgestrel intrauterine device (hormone-releasing intrauterine contraceptive device) is being used as a family planning method</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE572<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE572"> </a></td><td>Etonogestrel (ETG) one-rod implant</td><td><div><p>An etonogestrel one-rod implant is being used</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE574<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE574"> </a></td><td>DMPA-IM</td><td><div><p>Injectable depot medroxyprogesterone acetate (DMPA), administered intramuscularly, is being used as a family planning method</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE576<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE576"> </a></td><td>NET-EN norethisterone enanthate</td><td><div><p>Injectable norethisterone enanthate (NET-EN) is being used as a family planning method</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE577<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE577"> </a></td><td>Progestogen-only pills (POP)</td><td><div><p>Progestogen-only pills (POP) are being used as a family planning method</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE581<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE581"> </a></td><td>Progesterone-releasing vaginal ring (PVR)</td><td><div><p>Progesterone-releasing vaginal ring (PVR) is being used as a family planning method</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE582<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE582"> </a></td><td>Lactational amenorrhea method (LAM)</td><td><div><p>Lactational amenorrhea method (LAM) is being used as a family planning method</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE583<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE583"> </a></td><td>Emergency contraceptive pills (ECPs)</td><td><div><p>Client uses emergency contraceptive pills (ECPs)</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE588<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE588"> </a></td><td>Female relying on male method</td><td><div><p>The female client is relying on her male partner for contraceptive methods (e.g. male condoms, male sterilization, withdrawal)</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE590<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE590"> </a></td><td>Male sterilization</td><td><div><p>Male surgical sterilization (a vasectomy) is the family planning method used</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE591<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE591"> </a></td><td>Female sterilization</td><td><div><p>Female surgical sterilization procedure is the family planning method used</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE592<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE592"> </a></td><td>No method</td><td><div><p>Client is not using any family planning methods</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE593<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE593"> </a></td><td>Medication status</td><td><div><p>Current state of the client's taking of the medication</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE594<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE594"> </a></td><td>Currently taking</td><td><div><p>The medication is still being taken (active)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE595<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE595"> </a></td><td>Completed</td><td><div><p>The medication is no longer being taken</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE596<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE596"> </a></td><td>Entered in error</td><td><div><p>Entered in error</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE597<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE597"> </a></td><td>Intended</td><td><div><p>The medication may be taken at some time in the future</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE598<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE598"> </a></td><td>Stopped</td><td><div><p>Actions implied by the statement have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred. This should not be used if the statement was entered in error.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE599<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE599"> </a></td><td>On hold</td><td><div><p>The client has temporarily stopped taking the medication, but is expected to continue again later. May also be called 'suspended'.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE600<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE600"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>The state of the medication use is not currently known</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE601<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE601"> </a></td><td>Did not take</td><td><div><p>The client did not take the medication</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE602<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE602"> </a></td><td>Hepatitis B negative counselling conducted</td><td><div><p>Hepatitis B negative counselling conducted</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE603<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE603"> </a></td><td>Vaccine brand</td><td><div><p>The brand or trade name used to refer to the vaccine received</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE604<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE604"> </a></td><td>Vaccine type</td><td><div><p>Type of vaccine received (such as IPV, OPV)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE605<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE605"> </a></td><td>Date and time of vaccination</td><td><div><p>Represents the visit/encounter date, which is the date and time when the vaccine was administered to the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE606<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE606"> </a></td><td>Vaccination location</td><td><div><p>The service delivery location where the vaccine adminstration occurred</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE705<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE705"> </a></td><td>Date of diagnosis of cervical precancer lesions or invasive cervical cancer</td><td><div><p>Date of diagnosis of cervical precancer lesions or invasive cervical cancer</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE915<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE915"> </a></td><td>Methadone</td><td><div><p>Methadone currently being taken by, or considered for, client</p>
