</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE927<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE927"> </a></td><td>Triazolam</td><td><div><p>Triazolam currently being taken by, or considered for, client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE928<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE928"> </a></td><td>Estrogen-based hormonal contraception</td><td><div><p>Estrogen-based hormonal contraception currently being taken by, or considered for, client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE929<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE929"> </a></td><td>Ribavirin</td><td><div><p>Ribavirin currently being taken by, or considered for, client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE930<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE930"> </a></td><td>Peginterferon alfa-2a</td><td><div><p>Peginterferon alfa-2a currently being taken by, or considered for, client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE931<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE931"> </a></td><td>Other</td><td><div><p>Other medication currently being taken by, or considered for, client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE932<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE932"> </a></td><td>Other (specify)</td><td><div><p>Other medication currently being taken by, or considered for, client (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE933<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE933"> </a></td><td>Medication change recommended</td><td><div><p>A medication change is recommended for the client based upon current or considered medications</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE934<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE934"> </a></td><td>WHO HIV clinical stage condition or symptom</td><td><div><p>New or recurrent clinical events used to categorize HIV disease severity based at baseline and follow up</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE935<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE935"> </a></td><td>Pulmonary TB</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include pulmonary TB</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE936<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE936"> </a></td><td>Lymph node TB</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include lymph node TB</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE937<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE937"> </a></td><td>Extrapulmonary TB</td><td><div><p>Client's symptoms include extrapulmonary tuberculosis (TB)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE938<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE938"> </a></td><td>TB disease</td><td><div><p>Whether the client has tuberculosis (TB) disease. Sometimes known as active TB</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE939<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE939"> </a></td><td>TB diagnosis result</td><td><div><p>Final result of the TB investigation (bacteriological and/or clinical)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE940<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE940"> </a></td><td>Diagnosed TB</td><td><div><p>Client is diagnosed with TB disease</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE941<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE941"> </a></td><td>TB excluded</td><td><div><p>Client is not diagnosed with TB</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE942<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE942"> </a></td><td>Method of TB diagnosis</td><td><div><p>Method used to set the TB diagnosis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE943<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE943"> </a></td><td>Bacteriologically confirmed</td><td><div><p>A person from whom a biological specimen is positive by smear microscopy, culture or a WHO-recommended rapid diagnostic</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE944<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE944"> </a></td><td>Clinically diagnosed</td><td><div><p>A person who does not fulfil the criteria for bacteriological confirmation but has been diagnosed with TB disease by a medical practitioner who has decided to give the person a full course of TB treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE945<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE945"> </a></td><td>Presumptive TB</td><td><div><p>Client has signs or symptoms of tuberculosis (TB) without laboratory confirmation</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE946<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE946"> </a></td><td>Presumptive TB registration date</td><td><div><p>Date client is registered as having signs or symptoms of tuberculosis (TB) without laboratory confirmation</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE947<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE947"> </a></td><td>TB treatment history</td><td><div><p>History of previous TB treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE948<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE948"> </a></td><td>New</td><td><div><p>A person with TB disease who has never been treated for TB before or has only previously ever taken TB drugs for less than 1 month</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE949<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE949"> </a></td><td>Recurrent</td><td><div><p>A person with TB disease who was previously treated for TB, was declared cured or treatment completed at the end of their most recent course of TB treatment and is now diagnosed with a new episode of TB.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE950<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE950"> </a></td><td>Re-registered</td><td><div><p>A person with TB disease who had been notified previously as a TB case, but was not declared cured or treatment completed, and is now being registered for a new course of TB treatment.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE951<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE951"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>A person with TB disease who has undocumented history of TB treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE952<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE952"> </a></td><td>Date of TB diagnosis</td><td><div><p>The date when the diagnosis was established</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE953<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE953"> </a></td><td>Currently on TB preventive treatment (TPT)</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking TPT</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE954<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE954"> </a></td><td>TB preventive treatment (TPT) start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client began taking TPT</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE955<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE955"> </a></td><td>TB preventive treatment (TPT) completion date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client completed TPT</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE956<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE956"> </a></td><td>TB screening algorithm</td><td><div><p>Screening algorithm selected for screening activities</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE957<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE957"> </a></td><td>Screening with cough</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB based on cough symptom</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE958<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE958"> </a></td><td>Screening with any TB symptom</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB based on any TB symptom</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE959<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE959"> </a></td><td>W4SS single screening algorithm</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB based on the WHO-recommended four-symptom screen</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE960<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE960"> </a></td><td>CRP single screening algorithm</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB based on C-reactive protein (CRP) testing</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE961<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE961"> </a></td><td>CXR single screening algorithm</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB with a chest radiography (CXR)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE962<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE962"> </a></td><td>Parallel screening algorithm with W4SS and CRP</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB using parallel screening with WHO-recommended four-symptom screen and C-reactive protein (CRP) testing</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE963<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE963"> </a></td><td>Sequential positive screening algorithm with W4SS and CRP</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB using sequential positive screening with WHO-recommended four-symptom screen and C-reactive protein (CRP) testing.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE964<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE964"> </a></td><td>Sequential negative screening algorithm with W4SS and CRP</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB using sequential negative screening with WHO-recommended four-symptom screen and C-reactive protein (CRP) testing</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE965<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE965"> </a></td><td>Parallel screening algorithm with W4SS and CXR</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB using the parallel screening algorithm with W4SS and CXR</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE966<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE966"> </a></td><td>Sequential positive screening algorithm with W4SS and CXR</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB using sequential positive screening with WHO-recommended four-symptom screen and chest radiography</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE967<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE967"> </a></td><td>Sequential negative screening algorithm with W4SS and CXR</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB using sequential negative screening with WHO-recommended four-symptom screen and chest radiography</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE968<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE968"> </a></td><td>Screening with mWRD</td><td><div><p>Client screened for TB with a molecular WHO-recommended rapid diagnostic test (mWRD), such as an Xpert MTB/RIF test to detect Mycobacterium tuberculosis (MTB)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE969<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE969"> </a></td><td>Clinical assessment</td><td><div><p>Client screened for with a clinical evaluation for tuberculosis (TB) based on national guidelines. Clinical assessment may be used as an eligibility evaluation for testing with LF-LAM or for empiric TB treatment.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE970<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE970"> </a></td><td>Other TB screening algorithm</td><td><div><p>Client screened for tuberculosis (TB) with a different screening method not listed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE971<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE971"> </a></td><td>Other TB screening algorithm (specify)</td><td><div><p>Client screened for tuberculosis (TB) with a different screening method not listed (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE972<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE972"> </a></td><td>TB screening conducted</td><td><div><p>A screening for tuberculosis (TB) was performed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE973<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE973"> </a></td><td>Symptoms of TB</td><td><div><p>Symptoms that may indicate TB disease in clients living with HIV, based on a clinical algorithm</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE974<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE974"> </a></td><td>Current cough</td><td><div><p>Client has a cough regardless of duration</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE975<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE975"> </a></td><td>Prolonged cough (&gt;=2w)</td><td><div><p>Client has a prolonged cough of 2 weeks or more</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE976<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE976"> </a></td><td>Fever of 39 °C or greater</td><td><div><p>Client has a fever with a measured temperature of 102.2 °F/39 °C or greater</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE977<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE977"> </a></td><td>Weight loss (reported)</td><td><div><p>Unexplained weight loss</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE978<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE978"> </a></td><td>Night sweats</td><td><div><p>Client reports experiencing night sweats</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE979<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE979"> </a></td><td>Poor weight gain</td><td><div><p>Client reports poor weight gain of child or infant or growth curve flattening or weight for age &lt;-2 Z-scores.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE980<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE980"> </a></td><td>Reduced playfulness</td><td><div><p>Client reports reduced playfulness of child</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE981<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE981"> </a></td><td>Chest pain</td><td><div><p>Client reports chest pain</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE982<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE982"> </a></td><td>Haemoptysis</td><td><div><p>Client reports experiencing haemoptysis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE983<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE983"> </a></td><td>Lethargy</td><td><div><p>Client reports lethargy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE984<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE984"> </a></td><td/><td><div><p>No symptoms of TB identified</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE985<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE985"> </a></td><td>History of contact with a person with TB</td><td><div><p>Client had a history of a contact with a person with TB</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE986<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE986"> </a></td><td>TB screening result</td><td><div><p>Record the result of the tuberculosis (TB) screening</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE987<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE987"> </a></td><td>Screen positive for TB</td><td><div><p>Screening result was positive for tuberculosis (TB)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE988<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE988"> </a></td><td>Screen negative for TB</td><td><div><p>Screening result was negative for tuberculosis (TB)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE989<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE989"> </a></td><td>Inconclusive</td><td><div><p>Screening result was inconclusive for tuberculosis (TB)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE990<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE990"> </a></td><td>TB screening date</td><td><div><p>Date the TB screening was conducted</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE991<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE991"> </a></td><td>TB screening result date</td><td><div><p>The date when the result of TB screening is available</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE992<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE992"> </a></td><td>TB diagnostic test category</td><td><div><p>The type of diagnostic test performed to detect tuberculosis (TB) disease</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE993<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE993"> </a></td><td>LF-LAM</td><td><div><p>Client tested for tuberculosis with a lateral flow urine lipoarabinomannan assay</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE994<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE994"> </a></td><td>mWRD test for TB</td><td><div><p>Client tested with a WHO-recommended molecular diagnostic test to detect Mycobacterium tuberculosis (MTB)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE995<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE995"> </a></td><td>Microscopy - Sputum acid-fast bacilli (AFB)</td><td><div><p>Client tested for tuberculosis with a sputum acid-fast bacilli (AFB)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE996<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE996"> </a></td><td>TB Culture</td><td><div><p>Client tested for tuberculosis (TB) with a culture</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE997<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE997"> </a></td><td>TB diagnostic test date</td><td><div><p>The date when TB diagnostic test was performed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE998<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE998"> </a></td><td>Test sample collection date</td><td><div><p>The date when the test sample was collected from the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE999<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE999"> </a></td><td>TB diagnostic test result date</td><td><div><p>The date when the result of the TB diagnostic test is available</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1000<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1000"> </a></td><td>TB treatment started</td><td><div><p>Indicates if TB treatment was started</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1001<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1001"> </a></td><td>TB treatment start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client start or restarted tuberculosis (TB) treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1002<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1002"> </a></td><td>TB treatment outcome</td><td><div><p>Indicates patient's TB treatment outcome</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1003<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1003"> </a></td><td>Treatment failed</td><td><div><p>The treatment regimen terminated or permanently changed to a new regimen or treatment strategy. Reasons for the change include:</p>
<ul>
<li>no clinical response or no bacteriological response, or both (see note;</li>
<li>adverse drug reaction; or</li>
<li>evidence of additional drug-resistance to medicines in the regimen.</li>
</ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1004<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1004"> </a></td><td>Cured</td><td><div><p>Client with pulmonary TB with bacteriologically confirmed TB at the beginning of treatment who completed treatment as recommended by the national policy, with evidence of bacteriological response and no evidence of failure.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1005<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1005"> </a></td><td>Treatment completed</td><td><div><p>Patient completed treatment as recommended by the national policy but the outcome does not meet the definition for cure or treatment failure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1006<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1006"> </a></td><td>Died</td><td><div><p>Client died before starting treatment or during the course of treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1007<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1007"> </a></td><td>Lost to follow-up</td><td><div><p>Client was lost to follow-up</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1008<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1008"> </a></td><td>Not evaluated</td><td><div><p>No treatment outcome was assigned. This includes cases 'transferred out' to another treatment unit and whose treatment outcome is unknown; however, it excludes those lost to follow-up.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1009<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1009"> </a></td><td>TB treatment completion date</td><td><div><p>Date client completes TB treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1010<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1010"> </a></td><td>TB treatment regimen composition</td><td><div><p>TB drugs currently being taken by the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1011<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1011"> </a></td><td>Isoniazid</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking isoniazid</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1012<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1012"> </a></td><td>Rifampicin</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking rifampicin</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1013<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1013"> </a></td><td>Rifabutin</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking rifabutin</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1014<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1014"> </a></td><td>Ethambutol</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking ethambutol</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1015<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1015"> </a></td><td>Levofloxacin</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking levofloxacin</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1016<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1016"> </a></td><td>Pyrazinamide</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking pyrazinamide, a first-line anti-tuberculosis drug</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1017<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1017"> </a></td><td>Eligible for TB preventive treatment</td><td><div><p>Client is eligible for tuberculosis preventive treatment (TPT)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1018<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1018"> </a></td><td>Date when eligibility for TB preventive treatment (TPT) was determined</td><td><div><p>Date when a determination of the client's eligibility for TPT was made</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1019<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1019"> </a></td><td>TB status at ART start</td><td><div><p>Client's tuberculosis (TB) status when antiretroviral therapy (ART) is started</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1020<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1020"> </a></td><td>Symptomatic for TB</td><td><div><p>Signs or symptoms of tuberculosis (TB) without laboratory confirmation</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1021<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1021"> </a></td><td>Diagnosed TB</td><td><div><p>Laboratory confirmed tuberculosis (TB) diagnosis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1022<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1022"> </a></td><td/><td><div><p>Client has no signs or symptoms of tuberculosis (TB) and is not diagnosed with tuberculosis (TB)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1023<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1023"> </a></td><td>TB prevention services accepted</td><td><div><p>Indicates if the client accepts to be evaluated for TB infection and to take the treatment in case he/she is eligible</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1024<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1024"> </a></td><td>TB meningitis</td><td><div><p>Type of extrapulmonary TB identified for the client is TB meningitis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1025<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1025"> </a></td><td>C reactive protein test date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client has a test for C reactive protein</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1026<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1026"> </a></td><td>C reactive protein test result</td><td><div><p>Test result of the client's C reactive protein test result in mg/L</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1027<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1027"> </a></td><td>C reactive protein test result date</td><td><div><p>The date when the client's test result for C reactive protein is available</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1028<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1028"> </a></td><td>TPT regimen type</td><td><div><p>Type of TPT regimen the client is currently on</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1029<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1029"> </a></td><td>3HP</td><td><div><p>The client's current TPT regimen is 3HP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1030<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1030"> </a></td><td>1HP</td><td><div><p>The client's current TPT regimen is 1HP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1031<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1031"> </a></td><td>6H</td><td><div><p>The client's current TPT regimen is 6H</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1032<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1032"> </a></td><td>Six months of levofloxacin daily</td><td><div><p>The client's current TPT regimen is six months of levofloxacin daily</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1033<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1033"> </a></td><td>Other TB preventive treatment (TPT) regimen</td><td><div><p>The client's current TPT regimen is another regimen than those listed above</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1034<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1034"> </a></td><td>TB preventive treatment (TPT) status</td><td><div><p>Indicates the current status of TB preventive treatment (TPT)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1035<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1035"> </a></td><td>Not started</td><td><div><p>The client did not start the TB preventive treatment (TPT)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1036<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1036"> </a></td><td>On TPT</td><td><div><p>The client started the TB preventive treatment (TPT) and is currently taking the medication, without treatment interruptions</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1037<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1037"> </a></td><td>On TPT with interruptions</td><td><div><p>The client started the TB preventive treatment (TPT) and is currently taking the medication, with treatment interruptions</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1038<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1038"> </a></td><td>On hold</td><td><div><p>The health care worker has temporarily stopped the TB preventive treatment (TPT), but TPT is expected to continue again later. May also be called 'suspended'.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.D.DE1039<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46D.46DE1039"> </a></td><td>Completed</td><td><div><p>TB preventive treatment (TPT) was completed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE1<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE1"> </a></td><td>Pregnant woman's first name</td><td><div><p>Pregnant woman's first or given name</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE2<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE2"> </a></td><td>Pregnant woman's surname</td><td><div><p>Pregnant woman's family name or last name</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE3<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE3"> </a></td><td>Pregnant woman's unique ID</td><td><div><p>Unique identifier generated for new clients or a universal ID, if used in the country</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE4<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE4"> </a></td><td>Antenatal care number</td><td><div><p>Identification number assigned to woman at first visit to the ANC based on national system</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE5<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE5"> </a></td><td>Gestational age</td><td><div><p>Gestational age in weeks and/or days depending on the source of gestational age</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE6<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE6"> </a></td><td>Source of gestational age</td><td><div><p>Gestational age can be calculated multiple ways. This data element describes where the gestational age above has been calculated from.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE7<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE7"> </a></td><td>Last menstrual period (LMP)</td><td><div><p>Gestational age (GA) calculated from LMP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE8<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE8"> </a></td><td>Ultrasound</td><td><div><p>Woman's gestational age today calculated field using ultrasound GA and ultrasound date</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE9<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE9"> </a></td><td>Symphysis fundal height (SFH) or abdominal palpation</td><td><div><p>If LMP is unknown and either ultrasound wasn't done or it wasn't done early enough, then show the option for health worker to enter GA in weeks based on Symphysis Fundal Height (SFH) or abdominal palpation.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE10<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE10"> </a></td><td>Expected date of delivery (EDD)</td><td><div><p>Expected date of delivery based on gestational age</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE11<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE11"> </a></td><td>Number of pregnancies (gravida)</td><td><div><p>Total number of times the woman has been pregnant (including this pregnancy). Also referred to as gravida.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE12<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE12"> </a></td><td>Number of previous pregnancies</td><td><div><p>This calculates the total number of all previous pregnancies (i.e. not including this current pregnancy). This is done for easier obstetric history calculations.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE13<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE13"> </a></td><td>Number of miscarriages and/or abortions</td><td><div><p>Total number of pregnancies lost or ended due to miscarriages and/or abortions before 22 weeks / 5 months</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE14<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE14"> </a></td><td>Number of live births</td><td><div><p>Total number of live births after 22 weeks</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE15<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE15"> </a></td><td>Number of caesarian sections</td><td><div><p>Total number of caesarean sections</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE16<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE16"> </a></td><td>Number of stillbirths</td><td><div><p>Total number of stillbirths after 22 weeks</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE17<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE17"> </a></td><td>Past pregnancy complications</td><td><div><p>Whether the woman has had any complications or problems in any previous pregnancy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE18<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE18"> </a></td><td>No past pregnancy complications</td><td><div><p>No known past pregnancy problems</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE19<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE19"> </a></td><td>Does not know of any past pregnancy complications</td><td><div><p>Don't know if there were any problems during past pregnancies</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE20<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE20"> </a></td><td>Pre-eclampsia</td><td><div><p>A condition specific to pregnancy, arising after the 20th week of gestation, characterized by hypertension and proteinuria. Oedema may also be present, but is no longer considered a cardinal sign because it is present to some extent in most pregnancies. If not controlled, pre-eclampsia will lead to eclampsia which is characterized by fits, followed by coma, and has a high mortality rate.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE21<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE21"> </a></td><td>Eclampsia</td><td><div><p>A condition peculiar to pregnancy or a newly delivered woman, characterized by fits followed coma. The woman usually has hypertension and proteinuria. The fits may occur in the antepartum, intrapartum or early postpartum periods.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE22<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE22"> </a></td><td>Alcohol use</td><td><div><p>Alcohol intake</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE23<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE23"> </a></td><td>Baby died within 24 hours of birth</td><td><div><p>The woman's baby died within 24 hours of childbirth</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE24<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE24"> </a></td><td>Prolonged labour</td><td><div><p>The woman's experienced prolonged labour</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE25<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE25"> </a></td><td>Convulsions</td><td><div><p>Woman had convulsions during her past pregnancy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE26<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE26"> </a></td><td>Forceps</td><td><div><p>Woman required forceps delivery</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE27<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE27"> </a></td><td>Gestational diabetes mellitus</td><td><div><p>Hyperglycaemia first detected at any time during pregnancy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE28<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE28"> </a></td><td>Heavy bleeding (during or after delivery)</td><td><div><p>Woman was bleeding heavily during or after giving birth during previous pregnancy/pregnancies</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE29<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE29"> </a></td><td>Macrosomia</td><td><div><p>Fetus large for gestational age</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE30<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE30"> </a></td><td>Perineal tear (3rd or 4th degree)</td><td><div><p>Woman experienced 3rd or 4th degree perineal tear</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE31<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE31"> </a></td><td>Substance use</td><td><div><p>Illicit drug use (e.g. cannabis, amphetamines, prescription stimulants, opioids, opiates, ecstasy, cocaine)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE32<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE32"> </a></td><td>Tobacco use</td><td><div><p>Use of tobacco products, in any form</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE33<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE33"> </a></td><td>Vacuum delivery</td><td><div><p>Woman required vacuum delivery</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE34<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE34"> </a></td><td>Other past pregnancy problems</td><td><div><p>Woman experienced other past pregnancy problems not described above</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE35<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE35"> </a></td><td>Other past pregnancy problems (specify)</td><td><div><p>Woman experienced other past pregnancy problems not described above (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE36<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE36"> </a></td><td>Parity</td><td><div><p>Total number of live and stillbirths (calculated)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE37<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE37"> </a></td><td>Pregnancy in HIV-infected woman</td><td><div><p>Any HIV diagnosis in a pregnant woman as determined by the national HIV testing algorithm, or a pregnancy in a woman previously diagnosed with HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE38<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE38"> </a></td><td>Date new pregnancy of HIV-positive woman identified</td><td><div><p>Earliest date when a new pregnancy of an HIV-positive woman is recorded</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE39<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE39"> </a></td><td>ANC contact during pregnancy</td><td><div><p>Whether the mother had at least one ANC contact (visit)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE40<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE40"> </a></td><td>Date of first ANC visit</td><td><div><p>Date of the pregnant woman's first ANC visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE41<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE41"> </a></td><td>Timing of ART initiation</td><td><div><p>When the pregnant woman or mother initiated ART, for women living with HIV.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE42<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE42"> </a></td><td>Already on ART at first antenatal care visit</td><td><div><p>The pregnant woman was already on antiretroviral therapy (ART) at first antenatal care visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE43<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE43"> </a></td><td>Newly on ART during pregnancy</td><td><div><p>The pregnant woman started ART during her pregnancy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE44<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE44"> </a></td><td>Newly on ART during labour and delivery</td><td><div><p>The woman started ART during labour and delivery</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE45<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE45"> </a></td><td>Maternal use of recommended ART regimen</td><td><div><p>Whether the mother is taking a recommended ART regimen</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE46<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE46"> </a></td><td>Delivery date</td><td><div><p>Date on which the woman delivered</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE47<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE47"> </a></td><td>Pregnancy outcome</td><td><div><p>Outcome of current pregnancy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE48<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE48"> </a></td><td>Live birth</td><td><div><p>Outcome of pregnancy was a live birth</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE49<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE49"> </a></td><td>Early fetal loss/miscarriage</td><td><div><p>Outcome of pregnancy was early fetal loss/miscarriage</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE50<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE50"> </a></td><td>Induced abortion</td><td><div><p>Outcome of pregnancy was induced abortion</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE51<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE51"> </a></td><td>Stillbirth</td><td><div><p>Outcome of pregnancy was stillbirth</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE52<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE52"> </a></td><td>Delivery mode</td><td><div><p>Mode of delivery for current pregnancy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE53<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE53"> </a></td><td>Spontaneous vaginal delivery</td><td><div><p>Mode of delivery for current pregnancy spontaneous vaginal delivery (SVD)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE54<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE54"> </a></td><td>Assisted vaginal delivery</td><td><div><p>Mode of delivery for current pregnancy was assisted vaginal delivery</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE55<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE55"> </a></td><td>Caesarian section (C/S, operative delivery)</td><td><div><p>Mode of delivery for current pregnancy was caesarian section (C/S; operative delivery)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE56<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE56"> </a></td><td>Indications for caesarian section (C/S)</td><td><div><p>Indications for caesarian section</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE57<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE57"> </a></td><td>Obstetric complications</td><td><div><p>Serious or life-threatening obstetric complications during pregnancy, delivery or postpartum experienced by mother or her newborn</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE58<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE58"> </a></td><td>Live birth</td><td><div><p>The woman had a live birth</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE59<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE59"> </a></td><td>Live birth to an HIV-positive woman</td><td><div><p>A woman living with HIV had a live birth</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE60<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE60"> </a></td><td>Gestational age at birth</td><td><div><p>Best estimate of gestational age in completed weeks when infant was born (an indication of prematurity, preterm and extreme preterm)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE61<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE61"> </a></td><td>Small for gestational age (SGA)</td><td><div><p>Whether the infant was small for gestational age (SGA) at birth (&lt;10th percentile)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE62<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE62"> </a></td><td>Preterm birth status</td><td><div><p>The woman gave birth when the gestational age is less than 37 weeks</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE63<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE63"> </a></td><td>Not preterm</td><td><div><p>The birth was not preterm</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE64<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE64"> </a></td><td>Preterm (&lt;37 weeks gestation)</td><td><div><p>Gestational age at birth was &lt;37 weeks</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE65<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE65"> </a></td><td>Very preterm (&lt;32 weeks gestation)</td><td><div><p>Gestational age at birth was &lt;32 weeks</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE66<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE66"> </a></td><td>Maternal ART start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the infant was started or restarted on ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE67<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE67"> </a></td><td>Place of delivery</td><td><div><p>The type of place where the woman delivered</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE68<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE68"> </a></td><td>Health facility</td><td><div><p>The woman delivered at a health facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE69<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE69"> </a></td><td>Home</td><td><div><p>The woman delivered at home</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE70<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE70"> </a></td><td>Other</td><td><div><p>The woman delivered at another location that is not at home or at a health facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE71<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE71"> </a></td><td>Other (specify)</td><td><div><p>The woman delivered at another location that is not at home or at a health facility (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE72<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE72"> </a></td><td>Delivery facility</td><td><div><p>Facility where the infant or child was born</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE73<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE73"> </a></td><td>Date of miscarriage or abortion</td><td><div><p>Date of the miscarriage/abortion</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE74<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE74"> </a></td><td>Date of death of mother</td><td><div><p>Date that the woman died</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE75<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE75"> </a></td><td>Cause of death of mother</td><td><div><p>The woman's cause of death</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE76<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE76"> </a></td><td>Infant's first name</td><td><div><p>Infant's first or given name</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE77<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE77"> </a></td><td>Infant's surname</td><td><div><p>Infant's family name or last name</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE78<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE78"> </a></td><td>Infant's unique ID</td><td><div><p>Unique identifier generated for new clients or a universal ID, if used in the country</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE79<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE79"> </a></td><td>Mother's first name</td><td><div><p>Biological mother's first or given name</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE94<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE94"> </a></td><td>Other</td><td><div><p>Client identifies in a non-binary way</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE95<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE95"> </a></td><td>Infant height</td><td><div><p>The infant's height in centimetres</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE104<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE104"> </a></td><td>Maternal HIV test result</td><td><div><p>Test result for mother after applying the testing strategy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE105<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE105"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>Test result is HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE106<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE106"> </a></td><td>HIV-negative</td><td><div><p>Test result is HIV-negative</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE107<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE107"> </a></td><td>HIV-inconclusive</td><td><div><p>Test result is HIV-inconclusive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE108<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE108"> </a></td><td>Infant or child exposure to HIV</td><td><div><p>Whether the infant or child was determined to have had HIV exposure through mother</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE109<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE109"> </a></td><td>Not exposed</td><td><div><p>Infant or child is not known to have been exposed to HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE110<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE110"> </a></td><td>HIV-exposed</td><td><div><p>Infant had known exposure to HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE111<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE111"> </a></td><td>Unknown HIV exposure</td><td><div><p>Don't know whether infant or child was exposed to HIV, such as if mother's HIV status is unknown</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE112<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE112"> </a></td><td>HIV-exposed infant or child</td><td><div><p>Whether the infant or child was determined to have had HIV exposure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE113<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE113"> </a></td><td>Key population member</td><td><div><p>Mother is a member of a key population which has an increased risk of HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE114<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE114"> </a></td><td>Key population member type</td><td><div><p>The type of key population that the infant's mother is included in</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE115<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE115"> </a></td><td>Sex worker</td><td><div><p>Infant's mother is a sex worker</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE117<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE117"> </a></td><td>Trans and gender-diverse people</td><td><div><p>Infant's mother identifies as trans and gender-diverse</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE125<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE125"> </a></td><td>Insecticide treated bednet (ITN) provided or referred</td><td><div><p>An insecticide treated bednet (ITN) was provided or the client was referred</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE126<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE126"> </a></td><td>Maternal syphilis treatment</td><td><div><p>Whether or not mother was treated for syphilis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE127<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE127"> </a></td><td>Infant feeding practice</td><td><div><p>Infant feeding practice</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE128<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE128"> </a></td><td>Exclusively breastfeeding</td><td><div><p>Specifies whether the infant is exclusively being breastfed by the mother</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE129<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE129"> </a></td><td>Replacement feeding</td><td><div><p>Infant is not receiving any breast milk with a diet that provides all the nutrients needed until they can be fully fed on family foods</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE130<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE130"> </a></td><td>Mixed feeding</td><td><div><p>Infant younger than 6 months of age is given other liquids and/or foods together with breast milk. This could be water, other types of milk or any type of solid food.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE131<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE131"> </a></td><td>Infant feeding practice recorded date</td><td><div><p>Date on which infant feeding practice was recorded</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE132<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE132"> </a></td><td>Stopped breastfeeding</td><td><div><p>The mother has fully stopped breastfeeding the infant or child</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE133<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE133"> </a></td><td>Date stopped breastfeeding</td><td><div><p>The date on which the mother stopped breastfeeding the infant</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE134<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE134"> </a></td><td>Taking iron and folic acid (IFA) tablets</td><td><div><p>Is client taking her iron and folic acid (IFA) tablets? Select whether the woman is continuing to take IFA supplements</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE135<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE135"> </a></td><td>Amount of iron prescribed</td><td><div><p>Amount of iron supplements prescribed in milligrams for intake</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE136<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE136"> </a></td><td>Type of iron supplement dosage provided</td><td><div><p>Whether the amount of iron prescribed is for daily or weekly intake</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE137<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE137"> </a></td><td>Daily</td><td><div><p>Iron supplements prescribed for daily intake</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE138<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE138"> </a></td><td>Weekly</td><td><div><p>Iron supplements prescribed for daily intake</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE139<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE139"> </a></td><td>Amount of daily dose of folic acid prescribed</td><td><div><p>Amount of folic acid supplements prescribed in milligrams for daily intake</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE140<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE140"> </a></td><td>Date infant ARV prophylaxis dispensed (or started)</td><td><div><p>Date HIV-exposed infant received ARV prophylaxis (for the first time)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE141<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE141"> </a></td><td>Maternal HIV status</td><td><div><p>The HIV status of the infant's mother</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE142<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE142"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>Infant's mother is HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE143<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE143"> </a></td><td>HIV-negative</td><td><div><p>Infant's mother is HIV-negative</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE144<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE144"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>Don't know HIV status - client does not know partner's HIV status</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE145<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE145"> </a></td><td>Maternal HIV status at first ANC visit</td><td><div><p>The HIV status of the infant's mother at first ANC visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE146<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE146"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>Infant's mother is HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE147<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE147"> </a></td><td>HIV-negative</td><td><div><p>Infant's mother is HIV-negative</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE148<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE148"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>Don't know HIV status - client does not know partner's HIV status</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE149<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE149"> </a></td><td>Maternal syphilis test result</td><td><div><p>Result from maternal syphilis test</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE150<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE150"> </a></td><td>Positive</td><td><div><p>Test result is positive for syphilis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE151<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE151"> </a></td><td>Negative</td><td><div><p>Test result is negative for syphilis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE152<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE152"> </a></td><td>Inconclusive</td><td><div><p>Test result is inconclusive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE153<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE153"> </a></td><td>Hypertension</td><td><div><p>Whether the client has developed hypertension associated with pregnancy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE154<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE154"> </a></td><td>Pre-eclampsia</td><td><div><p>Whether the client has pre-eclampsia</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE155<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE155"> </a></td><td>Signs of substantial risk of HIV infection</td><td><div><p>Signs the client is at a substantial risk of HIV infection</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE156<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE156"> </a></td><td>No condom use during sex with more than one partner in the past 6 months</td><td><div><p>Recent vaginal or anal sexual intercourse without a condom with more than one partner</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE157<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE157"> </a></td><td>STI in the past 6 months</td><td><div><p>A recent history (in the last 6 months) of a sexually transmitted infection (STI) by laboratory testing or self-report of syndromic STI treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE158<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE158"> </a></td><td>A sexual partner in the past 6 months had one or more HIV risk factors</td><td><div><p>A recent sex partner of the client had HIV risk factors</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE159<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE159"> </a></td><td>PrEP requested by client</td><td><div><p>Client is requesting PrEP, reflecting a decision-making process has already taken place and suggesting of substantial risk of HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE160<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE160"> </a></td><td>Serodiscordant partner</td><td><div><p>Mother's HIV status is different from a current partner's HIV status</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE161<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE161"> </a></td><td>Date woman received counselling for CPT</td><td><div><p>Date woman received counselling for co-trimoxazole preventive therapy (CPT)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE162<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE162"> </a></td><td>Date woman received counselling for TPT</td><td><div><p>Date woman received counselling for TB preventive therapy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE163<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE163"> </a></td><td>Infant's co-trimoxazole prophylaxis start date</td><td><div><p>Start date of co-trimoxazole prophylaxis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE164<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE164"> </a></td><td>Infant's age when co-trimoxazole prophylaxis was started</td><td><div><p>The number of weeks or months infant was when started on co-trimoxazole (CTX) prophylaxis preventive therapy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE165<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE165"> </a></td><td>Presumptive clinical diagnosis of severe HIV infection in infants</td><td><div><p>Presumptive clinical diagnosis of severe HIV infection in infants</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE166<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE166"> </a></td><td>Infant ARV prophylaxis</td><td><div><p>Infant is taking an antiretroviral prophylaxis to prevent infection from HIV exposure</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE167<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE167"> </a></td><td>Infant ARV prophylaxis start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the infant was started on an antiretroviral prophylaxis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE168<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE168"> </a></td><td>HIV test type</td><td><div><p>Type of HIV test</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE178<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE178"> </a></td><td>Birth cohort</td><td><div><p>Month and year of infant's birth, which the infant is registered into. The cohort is a group of infants born in the same month, whose status is followed over time.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE179<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE179"> </a></td><td>Registered in birth cohort</td><td><div><p>Whether the infant has been registered in a birth cohort</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE226<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE226"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>Infant is HIV-positive</p>

</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE228<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE228"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>Infant has unknown HIV status</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE229<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE229"> </a></td><td>Infant ART start date</td><td><div><p>The date on which the infant was started or restarted on antiretroviral therapy (ART)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE230<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE230"> </a></td><td>Final diagnosis of HIV-exposed infant</td><td><div><p>HIV-exposed infant final status at 18 months or 3 months after cessation of breastfeeding (whichever is later).</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE231<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE231"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>The infant is HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE232<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE232"> </a></td><td>HIV-negative and no longer breastfeeding</td><td><div><p>The infant is HIV-negative and the mother has quit breastfeeding</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE233<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE233"> </a></td><td>HIV status unknown</td><td><div><p>The final HIV status of the child is unknown because the infant died, was lost to follow-up or transferred out without ever having an HIV-positive diagnosis or is active in care but was not tested at 18 months</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE234<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE234"> </a></td><td>HIV-exposed infant reason for unknown final status</td><td><div><p>The outcome for the infant does not have a final outcome, which may because of death, stopped treatment or lost to follow-up.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE235<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE235"> </a></td><td>Lost to follow-up</td><td><div><p>Twenty-eight days or more since last missed appointment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE236<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE236"> </a></td><td>Transferred out</td><td><div><p>The client transferred to another facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE237<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE237"> </a></td><td>Death (documented)</td><td><div><p>People living with HIV previously on ART who are confirmed to have died from any cause</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE238<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE238"> </a></td><td>Refused (stopped) treatment</td><td><div><p>Client was contacted and confirmed to have stopped ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE239<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE239"> </a></td><td>Date of death of infant</td><td><div><p>Date that the infant died</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE240<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE240"> </a></td><td>Cause of death of infant</td><td><div><p>The infant's cause of death</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE241<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE241"> </a></td><td>Infant died within 24 hours of childbirth</td><td><div><p>The infant died within 24 hours of childbirth</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE242<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE242"> </a></td><td>Action(s) needed during infant follow-up visit</td><td><div><p>Any actions needed during infant follow-up visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE243<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE243"> </a></td><td>Timing of additional infant HIV test</td><td><div><p>Age in months when additional infant HIV test is performed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE244<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE244"> </a></td><td>Date of sample collection of additional infant HIV test</td><td><div><p>Date of sample collection of additional infant HIV test</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE245<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE245"> </a></td><td>Haemoglobin (Hb) result</td><td><div><p>Result of woman's haemoglobin test during ANC, labour or delivery. Full blood count testing is recommended, and if not available, use of  haemoglobinometer over haemoglobin colour scale.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE246<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE246"> </a></td><td>Blood group and Rh factor</td><td><div><p>Mother's blood type and blood Rh factor</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE247<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE247"> </a></td><td>A+</td><td><div><p>Mother's blood type and blood Rh factor is A+</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE248<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE248"> </a></td><td>A-</td><td><div><p>Mother's blood type and blood Rh factor is A-</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE249<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE249"> </a></td><td>B+</td><td><div><p>Mother's blood type and blood Rh factor is B+</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE250<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE250"> </a></td><td>B-</td><td><div><p>Mother's blood type and blood Rh factor is B-</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE251<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE251"> </a></td><td>O+</td><td><div><p>Mother's blood type and blood Rh factor is O+</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE252<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE252"> </a></td><td>O-</td><td><div><p>Mother's blood type and blood Rh factor is O-</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE253<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE253"> </a></td><td>AB+</td><td><div><p>Mother's blood type and blood Rh factor is AB+</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE254<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE254"> </a></td><td>AB-</td><td><div><p>Mother's blood type and blood Rh factor is AB-</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE255<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE255"> </a></td><td>Asymptomatic bacteriuria (ASB) test result</td><td><div><p>Result of urine culture (or urine Gram-staining if not available over dipstick tests) for diagnosing asymptomatic bacteriuria</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE256<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE256"> </a></td><td>Positive</td><td><div><p>Result of test for asymptomatic bacteriuria is positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE257<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE257"> </a></td><td>Negative</td><td><div><p>Result of test for asymptomatic bacteriuria is negative</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE258<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE258"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>Result of test for asymptomatic bacteriuria is unknown</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE259<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE259"> </a></td><td>Urine protein test result</td><td><div><p>Results of urine protein test of mother during ANC visit</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE260<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE260"> </a></td><td>0</td><td><div><p>Result of urine protein test of mother during ANC visit is '0'</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE261<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE261"> </a></td><td>+</td><td><div><p>Result of urine protein test of mother during ANC visit is '+'</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE262<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE262"> </a></td><td>++</td><td><div><p>Result of urine protein test of mother during ANC visit is '++'</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE263<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE263"> </a></td><td>+++</td><td><div><p>Result of urine protein test of mother during ANC visit is '+++'</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE264<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE264"> </a></td><td>Type of hypertensive disorder</td><td><div><p>Type of hypertensive disorder of the mother</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE265<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE265"> </a></td><td>Chronic hypertension</td><td><div><p>Hypertension detected pre-pregnancy or before 20 weeks' gestation</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE266<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE266"> </a></td><td>Essential</td><td><div><p>Hypertension without a known secondary cause (pre-pregnancy or at less than 20 weeks)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE267<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE267"> </a></td><td>Secondary</td><td><div><p>Hypertension with a known secondary cause (e.g. renal disease; detected pre-pregnancy or at less than 20 weeks)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE268<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE268"> </a></td><td>White-coat hypertension</td><td><div><p>sBP greater than or equal to 140 and/or dBP greater than or equal to 90 mmHg when measured in the office or clinic, and BP less than 135/85 mmHg using HBPM or ABPM readings (pre-pregnancy or at less than 20 weeks)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE269<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE269"> </a></td><td>Masked hypertension</td><td><div><p>BP that is less than 140/90 mmHg at a clinic/office visit, but greater then or equal to 135/85 mmHg at other times outside the clinic/ office (pre-pregnancy or at less than 20 weeks)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE270<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE270"> </a></td><td>Gestational hypertension</td><td><div><p>Hypertension arising de novo at greater than or equal to 20 weeks' gestation in the absence of proteinuria or other findings suggestive of pre-eclampsia</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE271<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE271"> </a></td><td>Transient gestational hypertension</td><td><div><p>Hypertension arising at greater than or equal to 20 weeks' gestation in the clinic, which resolves with repeated BP readings</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE272<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE272"> </a></td><td>Pre-eclampsia</td><td><div><p>Pre-eclampsia</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.E.DE273<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46E.46DE273"> </a></td><td>Superimposed on chronic hypertension</td><td><div><p>Among women with chronic hypertension, development of new proteinuria, another maternal organ dysfunction(s), or evidence of uteroplacental dysfunction.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE1<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE1"> </a></td><td>CD4 count</td><td><div><p>CD4 cell count in cells/mm^3</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE2<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE2"> </a></td><td>CD4 cell percentage</td><td><div><p>CD4 cell percentage</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE3<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE3"> </a></td><td>Baseline CD4 count</td><td><div><p>CD4 count performed at HIV diagnosis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE4<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE4"> </a></td><td>Date of baseline CD4 count sample collection</td><td><div><p>Date and time when baseline CD4 count test sample was collected</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE5<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE5"> </a></td><td>Late ART initiation</td><td><div><p>The client's first CD4 count from baseline CD4 test performed (such as at HIV diagnosis) was a count of &lt;200 cells/mm3</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE6<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE6"> </a></td><td>Date of CD4 sample collection</td><td><div><p>Date sample to be used for CD4 count was collected</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE7<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE7"> </a></td><td>Viral load test conducted</td><td><div><p>A viral load test was performed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE8<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE8"> </a></td><td>Date of viral load sample collection</td><td><div><p>Date and time when the sample was collected to test the client's HIV viral load</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE9<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE9"> </a></td><td>Date of first viral load sample collection</td><td><div><p>Date and time when the sample was collected to test the client's HIV viral load for the first time</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE10<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE10"> </a></td><td>Date viral load sample sent</td><td><div><p>Date viral load sample sent to the lab</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE11<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE11"> </a></td><td>First viral load test result</td><td><div><p>Result from the initial viral load test in number of copies/mL</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE12<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE12"> </a></td><td>Viral load test result</td><td><div><p>Result from the viral load test in number of copies/mL</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE13<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE13"> </a></td><td>HIV viral load specimen type</td><td><div><p>The type of specimen to be used to test viral load</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE14<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE14"> </a></td><td>Liquid plasma specimen for viral load testing</td><td><div><p>Liquid plasma and using ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA) or plasma preparation tubes for viral load test</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE15<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE15"> </a></td><td>Dried blood spot specimen</td><td><div><p>Dried blood spot specimen (DBS) for viral load test</p>
