</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.G.DE80<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46G.46DE80"> </a></td><td>Other test(s) result(s)</td><td><div><p>Input the result from the test(s).</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE1<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE1"> </a></td><td>Reason for follow-up</td><td><div><p>The reason why the client is being followed up</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE2<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE2"> </a></td><td>Missed care visit</td><td><div><p>Client did not present for a care appointment as scheduled / as expected</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE3<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE3"> </a></td><td>Missed medication pickup</td><td><div><p>Client did not pick up medication as scheduled from pharmacy or other drug distribution point</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE4<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE4"> </a></td><td>Did not initiate ART</td><td><div><p>Client did not initiate ART at the same time as diagnosis (e.g., because they required additional counselling) and required follow-up for ART initiation</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE5<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE5"> </a></td><td>Incomplete visit</td><td><div><p>Client presented for care, but left before services were completed, e.g., due to long wait times or not staying to have labs taken</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE6<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE6"> </a></td><td>Inconclusive HIV status</td><td><div><p>Client has not returned for a follow-up test after an inconclusive test result</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE7<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE7"> </a></td><td>Test results received</td><td><div><p>Client needs to be informed of test results (e.g., viral load)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE8<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE8"> </a></td><td>Other follow-up reason</td><td><div><p>Client was followed up for another reason</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE9<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE9"> </a></td><td>Other follow-up reason (specify)</td><td><div><p>Client was followed up for another reason (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE10<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE10"> </a></td><td>Client contact attempted</td><td><div><p>An attempt to locate the client was made</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE11<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE11"> </a></td><td>Date of contact attempt</td><td><div><p>Date of attempt to contact client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE12<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE12"> </a></td><td>Contact attempted by</td><td><div><p>Who attempted to reach out to the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE13<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE13"> </a></td><td>Contact method</td><td><div><p>Method used to try to reach out to the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE14<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE14"> </a></td><td>Home visit</td><td><div><p>Contacted client at home</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE15<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE15"> </a></td><td>Text message</td><td><div><p>Contacted client by short message service (SMS) text</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE16<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE16"> </a></td><td>Phone</td><td><div><p>Contacted client by phone call</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE17<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE17"> </a></td><td>Source of information</td><td><div><p>Source of information about the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE18<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE18"> </a></td><td>Client</td><td><div><p>The client was the source of information</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE19<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE19"> </a></td><td>Informed by treatment provider</td><td><div><p>Source of information was a treatment provider of the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE20<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE20"> </a></td><td>Informed by family or partner</td><td><div><p>Source of information was a family member of partner</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE21<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE21"> </a></td><td>Other source of information</td><td><div><p>Information about the client's status was provided by someone else</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE22<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE22"> </a></td><td>Other source of information (specify)</td><td><div><p>Information about the client's status was provided by someone else (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE23<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE23"> </a></td><td>Outcome from outreach attempt</td><td><div><p>Detailed outcome from the attempt to locate the client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE24<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE24"> </a></td><td>Returning to clinic</td><td><div><p>Client was located and agreed to return to clinic</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE25<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE25"> </a></td><td>Self-transferred out</td><td><div><p>Client transferred to another facility for care (client-initiated transfer, not provider-initiated transfer)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE26<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE26"> </a></td><td>Hospitalized</td><td><div><p>Client was hospitalized</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE27<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE27"> </a></td><td>Refused to return</td><td><div><p>Client was found but declined to return to treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE28<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE28"> </a></td><td>Not located</td><td><div><p>Attempt was made to locate client, but client was not found</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE29<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE29"> </a></td><td>Died (reported)</td><td><div><p>The client was reported as having died</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE30<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE30"> </a></td><td>Moved from catchment area</td><td><div><p>The client moved from the catchment area (may be reported from the community level)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE31<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE31"> </a></td><td>Date client moved from catchment area</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client moved from the catchment area, if known</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE32<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE32"> </a></td><td>New catchment area</td><td><div><p>New catchment area where the client resides</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE33<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE33"> </a></td><td>Partner or contact of index case</td><td><div><p>The client was identified by an index case as a partner or contact</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE34<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE34"> </a></td><td>HIV status of partner or contact</td><td><div><p>HIV status of the partner or contact given by the index case</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE35<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE35"> </a></td><td>Already knew positive</td><td><div><p>The partner or contact of the index case already knew they are HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE36<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE36"> </a></td><td>Newly diagnosed</td><td><div><p>The partner or contact of the index case is newly diagnosed as HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE37<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE37"> </a></td><td>Negative</td><td><div><p>The partner or contact of the index case is newly diagnosed is HIV-negative</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE38<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE38"> </a></td><td>Date of death</td><td><div><p>If deceased, the date that the client died</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE39<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE39"> </a></td><td>Cause of death</td><td><div><p>Cause of death, if known</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE40<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE40"> </a></td><td>Place of death</td><td><div><p>Where the client died, if known</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE41<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE41"> </a></td><td>HIV treatment outcome</td><td><div><p>The outcome for the client which is used for reporting retention/attrition.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE42<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE42"> </a></td><td>Lost to follow-up</td><td><div><p>Twenty-eight days or more since last missed appointment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE43<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE43"> </a></td><td>Transferred out</td><td><div><p>The client transferred to another facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE44<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE44"> </a></td><td>Death (documented)</td><td><div><p>People living with HIV previously on ART who are confirmed to have died from any cause</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE45<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE45"> </a></td><td>Refused (stopped) treatment</td><td><div><p>Client was contacted and confirmed to have stopped ART (reasons may include stigma and discrimination, faith healing, etc.)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE46<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE46"> </a></td><td>Date patient lost to follow-up</td><td><div><p>Date patient was lost to follow-up (LTFU)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE47<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE47"> </a></td><td>On ART</td><td><div><p>Client is currently taking ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE48<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE48"> </a></td><td>Date HIV treatment outcome changed</td><td><div><p>The date on which the client's outcome (lost to follow-up, transferred out, death (documented), or refused (stopped) treatment) changed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE49<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE49"> </a></td><td>Transfer confirmed</td><td><div><p>Select if transfer to another facility is confirmed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE50<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE50"> </a></td><td>Transfer to facility</td><td><div><p>Name of health facility client was transferred to</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE51<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE51"> </a></td><td>Date of transfer out</td><td><div><p>The date the client transferred out of the facility to be provided with care at another facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE52<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE52"> </a></td><td>Adherence assessment</td><td><div><p>Whether client is adherent or not to ART regimen per national guidelines (immunological or virological monitoring)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE53<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE53"> </a></td><td>Reason(s) for adherence problem</td><td><div><p>Reason why client is not adherent</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE54<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE54"> </a></td><td>Forgot</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because they forgot</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE55<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE55"> </a></td><td>Toxicity/side effects</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of toxicity/side effects</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE56<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE56"> </a></td><td>Busy</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because they were busy</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE57<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE57"> </a></td><td>Change of routine</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of a change of routine</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE58<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE58"> </a></td><td>Travel cost</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of travel cost</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE59<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE59"> </a></td><td>Distance to clinic</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of distance to clinic</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE60<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE60"> </a></td><td>Client lost/ran out of pills</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of client lost/ran out of pills</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE61<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE61"> </a></td><td>Stock-out</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of a stock-out</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE62<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE62"> </a></td><td>Too ill</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of being too ill</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE63<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE63"> </a></td><td>Pill burden</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of the pill burden</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE64<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE64"> </a></td><td>Felt well</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because they felt well</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE65<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE65"> </a></td><td>Depression</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of depression</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE66<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE66"> </a></td><td>Alcohol use</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of alcohol use</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE67<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE67"> </a></td><td>Substance use</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of substance use (i.e., drugs)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE68<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE68"> </a></td><td>Stigma/disclosure concerns</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of stigma/disclosure concerns</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE69<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE69"> </a></td><td>Lack of food</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of a lack of food</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE70<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE70"> </a></td><td>Poor palatability</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of poor palatability</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE71<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE71"> </a></td><td>Other</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of other reason</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE72<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE72"> </a></td><td>Other (specify)</td><td><div><p>Client reported not being adherent because of other reason (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE73<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE73"> </a></td><td>Date ART stopped</td><td><div><p>Date on which client stopped ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE74<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE74"> </a></td><td>Reason ART stopped</td><td><div><p>Reason why client intentionally stopped ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE75<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE75"> </a></td><td>Toxicity/side effects</td><td><div><p>Client stopped ART because of toxicity/side effects</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE76<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE76"> </a></td><td>Severe illness, hospitalization</td><td><div><p>Client stopped ART because of severe illness, hospitalization</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE77<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE77"> </a></td><td>Drugs out of stock</td><td><div><p>Client stopped ART because of drugs being out of stock</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE78<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE78"> </a></td><td>Client lacks finances</td><td><div><p>Client stopped ART because client lacked finances</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE79<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE79"> </a></td><td>Excluded HIV infection in infant</td><td><div><p>Client stopped ART because the infant was determined to not have HIV</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE80<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE80"> </a></td><td>Other reason for stopping ART</td><td><div><p>Client stopped ART for other reason</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.H.DE81<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46H.46DE81"> </a></td><td>Other reason for stopping ART (specify)</td><td><div><p>Client stopped ART for other reason (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE1<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE1"> </a></td><td>Emergency referral</td><td><div><p>Referral for urgent care</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE2<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE2"> </a></td><td>Reason for referral</td><td><div><p>Reason why the client is being referred. If diagnosed, this may include the reason for the diagnosis.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE3<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE3"> </a></td><td>Hospital</td><td><div><p>Client's clinical status warrants hospitalization</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE4<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE4"> </a></td><td>Referral for screening including diagnostics and lab testing</td><td><div><p>The client is referred because they need a lab test done and/or diagnostics done, but those services are unavailable at the current health facility or providers. This includes referral for TB screening (is symptomatic of TB, has had close contact with confirmed TB case, etc.) and other comorbidities or coinfections.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE5<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE5"> </a></td><td>TB referral</td><td><div><p>Referral for TB care</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE6<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE6"> </a></td><td>Antenatal care referral</td><td><div><p>Client was referred because the client is pregnant</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE7<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE7"> </a></td><td>Referral for other general services</td><td><div><p>If none of the reasons above apply, this should be selected</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE8<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE8"> </a></td><td>Referral for other general services (specify)</td><td><div><p>If none of the reasons above apply, specify the reason(s)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE9<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE9"> </a></td><td>Any treatment given before referral?</td><td><div><p>If client was referred, was any treatment provided before referral?</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE10<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE10"> </a></td><td>Date of scheduled referral appointment</td><td><div><p>When the referral is scheduled</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE11<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE11"> </a></td><td>Location of scheduled referral appointment</td><td><div><p>Where the client is being referred to</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE12<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE12"> </a></td><td>Date referral was made</td><td><div><p>The date the referral was made</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE13<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE13"> </a></td><td>Provider who made referral</td><td><div><p>The name of the provider who made the referral</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE14<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE14"> </a></td><td>Provider's facility</td><td><div><p>Facility client is being referred from</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE15<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE15"> </a></td><td>Provider's telephone number</td><td><div><p>The contact details of the provider making the referral</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE16<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE16"> </a></td><td>Referral notes</td><td><div><p>Any additional relevant details of clinical significance for the referral facility to provide quality care</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.I.DE17<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46I.46DE17"> </a></td><td>Client history summary</td><td><div><p>With interoperable systems, the provider receiving the referral should be able to access the client's health record digitally. However, in the absence of this, the referral provider should receive a summary of the client's health records that includes the client's history, medications, medications prescribed or dispensed, reported issues and concerns, and any other relevant clinical information the health care provider had already obtained.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE1<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE1"> </a></td><td>At elevated risk for HIV acquisition</td><td><div><p>Client is at elevated risk for HIV acquisition, defined according to country/programme context</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE2<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE2"> </a></td><td>HIV prevention intervention</td><td><div><p>HIV prevention intervention that client accessed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE3<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE3"> </a></td><td>PrEP service</td><td><div><p>Client accessed PrEP services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE4<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE4"> </a></td><td>OAMT</td><td><div><p>Client accessed opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE5<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE5"> </a></td><td>NSP</td><td><div><p>Client accessed needle-syringe programme (NSP) services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE6<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE6"> </a></td><td>STI services</td><td><div><p>Client accessed sexually transmitted infection (STI) services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE7<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE7"> </a></td><td>VMMC</td><td><div><p>Client accessed voluntary medical male circumcision (VMMC) services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE8<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE8"> </a></td><td>Other</td><td><div><p>Client accessed other HIV prevention services</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE9<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE9"> </a></td><td>Other (specify)</td><td><div><p>Client accessed other HIV prevention services (specify)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE10<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE10"> </a></td><td>Date accessed HIV prevention intervention</td><td><div><p>Date the client accessed HIV prevention intervention</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE11<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE11"> </a></td><td>HIV status of contact</td><td><div><p>The HIV status of the client's contact</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE12<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE12"> </a></td><td>HIV-positive</td><td><div><p>Client's contact is HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE13<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE13"> </a></td><td>HIV-negative</td><td><div><p>Client's contact is HIV-negative</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE14<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE14"> </a></td><td>Unknown</td><td><div><p>Client does not know contact's HIV status</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE15<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE15"> </a></td><td>Date injecting equipment provided</td><td><div><p>Date client was provided with injecting equipment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE16<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE16"> </a></td><td>Number of needles-syringes provided</td><td><div><p>Number of needles-syringes provided to client</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE17<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE17"> </a></td><td>Date OAMT initiated</td><td><div><p>Date client initiated opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE18<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE18"> </a></td><td>Date OAMT dose received</td><td><div><p>Date client received opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) dose</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE19<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE19"> </a></td><td>Date OAMT take-away dose(s) dispensed</td><td><div><p>Date the client was dispensed opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) take-away dose(s)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE20<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE20"> </a></td><td>Currently on OAMT</td><td><div><p>Client is currently on opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) at reporting date, defined according to country/program to account for medication dispensed and LTFU criterion</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE21<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE21"> </a></td><td>Retained on OAMT</td><td><div><p>Client is retained on opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) at reporting date, defined according to country/program to account for medication dispensed and LTFU criterion</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE22<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE22"> </a></td><td>Client being inducted on OAMT</td><td><div><p>Client is currently being inducted on opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT), defined according to country/program</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE23<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE23"> </a></td><td>Client on reducing doses of OAMT</td><td><div><p>Client is current on reducing doses of opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT), defined according to country/program</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE24<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE24"> </a></td><td>Date first maintenance dose received</td><td><div><p>First date on which client received maintenance dose</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE25<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE25"> </a></td><td>Date of loss to follow-up or OAMT stopped</td><td><div><p>Date of loss to follow-up or opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) stopped</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE26<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE26"> </a></td><td>Date medications dispensed</td><td><div><p>Date the client was dispensed medications</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE27<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE27"> </a></td><td>Date medications prescribed</td><td><div><p>Date the client was prescribed medications</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.PRV.DE28<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46PRV.46DE28"> </a></td><td>Number of days prescribed</td><td><div><p>Days of medication client has been prescribed</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE1<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE1"> </a></td><td>Population prevalence of TB</td><td><div><p>The tuberculosis prevalence in the general population in number of cases per 100 000 persons or greater.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE2<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE2"> </a></td><td>Population prevalence of soil-transmitted helminth infection</td><td><div><p>The percentage of individuals in the general population infected with at least one species of soil-transmitted helminths</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE3<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE3"> </a></td><td>Population incidence of HIV in the absence of PrEP</td><td><div><p>HIV incidence number of cases per 100 person–years in the absence of PrEP</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE4<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE4"> </a></td><td>Population prevalence of HIV</td><td><div><p>The proportion of the population that are HIV-positive</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE5<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE5"> </a></td><td>Prevalence of pretreatment NNRTI drug resistance</td><td><div><p>Prevalence of pretreatment HIV drug resistance to NNRTIs among people initiating first-line ART</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE6<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE6"> </a></td><td>Malaria-endemic setting</td><td><div><p>Whether the setting is a malaria-endemic setting</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE7<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE7"> </a></td><td>Population prevalence of syphilis</td><td><div><p>The proportion of the population with syphilis</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE8<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE8"> </a></td><td>Population prevalence of hepatitis B</td><td><div><p>The proportion of hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg) seroprevalence in the general population</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE9<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE9"> </a></td><td>Population prevalence of hepatitis C</td><td><div><p>The proportion of hepatitis C virus (HCV) antibody seroprevalence in the general population</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE10<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE10"> </a></td><td>Prevalence of HIV in the catchment area</td><td><div><p>The proportion of the population from the health facility's catchment area that are HIV-positive (estimated)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE11<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE11"> </a></td><td>Ultrasound available at the health facility</td><td><div><p>Whether an ultrasound machine is available and functional in the facility and a trained health worker is available to use it</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE12<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE12"> </a></td><td>HIV burden of the setting</td><td><div><p>HIV burden of the setting (high or low) based on the national HIV prevalence or where the HIV prevalence and/or incidence in a geographical setting is higher than national prevalence and, therefore, needs priority in the HIV response</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE13<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE13"> </a></td><td>High HIV burden setting</td><td><div><p>Settings with &gt;5% national HIV prevalence and subpopulations and geographic settings where HIV prevalence and/or incidence is higher than nationally.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE14<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE14"> </a></td><td>Low HIV burden setting</td><td><div><p>Settings with &lt;5% HIV national prevalence but where certain populations (primarily key populations and their partners) and geographic settings may have higher HIV prevalence and/or incidence than nationally and, therefore, need priority in the HIV response</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE15<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE15"> </a></td><td>HPV DNA testing operational at the health facility</td><td><div><p>Is HPV DNA testing operational at the health facility for cervical cancer screening?</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE16<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE16"> </a></td><td>Routine viral load testing is available</td><td><div><p>Routine viral load testing is available in the facility</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE17<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE17"> </a></td><td>Health facility ID</td><td><div><p>Unique ID of the health facility that recorded the client. This ID could represent a universal health facility ID, if used in the country. Alternatively this ID can also be generated by the national surveillance system and assigned to reporting facility.</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE18<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE18"> </a></td><td>TB treating facility ID</td><td><div><p>The facility where the client is receiving tuberculosis (TB) treatment</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE19<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE19"> </a></td><td>Other priority populations</td><td><div><p>Other populations of priority of HIV prevention and care in local context (provided during adaptation)</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE20<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE20"> </a></td><td>Reporting period end date</td><td><div><p>End date of the reporting period</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE21<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE21"> </a></td><td>Reporting period start date</td><td><div><p>Start date of the reporting period</p>
</div></td></tr><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap">HIV.Config.DE22<a name="HIVConcepts-HIV.46Config.46DE22"> </a></td><td>Reporting date</td><td><div><p>Reporting date, for surveys performed on a specific date</p>
</div></td></tr></table></div>
  </text>

  <name value="HIVConcepts"/>
  <title value="WHO SMART HIV Concepts CodeSystem"/>
  <status value="draft"/>
  <experimental value="true"/>
  <date value="2024-06-28T22:14:31+00:00"/>
  <publisher value="World Health Organization"/>
  <contact>
    <telecom>
      <system value="url"/>
      <value value="https://www.who.int"/>
    </telecom>
  </contact>
  <description
               value="This code system defines the concepts used in the World Health Organization SMART HIV DAK"/>
  <jurisdiction>
    <coding>
      <system value="http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/m49/m49.htm"/>
      <code value="001"/>
    </coding>
  </jurisdiction>
  <caseSensitive value="false"/>
  <content value="complete"/>
  <count value="2093"/>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE1"/>
    <display value="First name"/>
    <definition value="Client's first or given name"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE2"/>
    <display value="Family name"/>
    <definition value="Client's family name or last name"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE3"/>
    <display value="Visit date"/>
    <definition value="The date and time of the client's visit"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE4"/>
    <display value="Referral"/>
    <definition value="If client was referred for care"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE5"/>
    <display value="Referred by"/>
    <definition value="How the client was referred"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE6"/>
    <display value="Community"/>
    <definition value="Referred by the community level services"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE7"/>
    <display value="Facility"/>
    <definition value="Referred by the health facility"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE8"/>
    <display value="Unique identifier"/>
    <definition
                value="Unique identifier generated for new clients or a universal ID, if used in the country"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE9"/>
    <display value="National ID"/>
    <definition
                value="National unique identifier assigned to the client, if used in the country"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE10"/>
    <display value="National health ID"/>
    <definition
                value="National health unique identifier assigned to the client, if used in the country"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE11"/>
    <display value="National programme ID"/>
    <definition
                value="National programme unique identifier assigned to the client, if used in the country"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE12"/>
    <display value="National health insurance ID"/>
    <definition
                value="National health insurance unique identifier assigned to the client, if used in the country"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE13"/>
    <display value="Country of birth"/>
    <definition value="Country where the client was born"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE14"/>
    <display value="Date of birth"/>
    <definition value="The client's date of birth (DOB) if known"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE15"/>
    <display value="Date of birth unknown"/>
    <definition value="Is the client's DOB is unknown?"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE16"/>
    <display value="Estimated age"/>
    <definition
                value="If DOB is unknown, enter the client's estimated age. Display client's age in number of years."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE17"/>
    <display value="Age"/>
    <definition
                value="Calculated age (number of years) of the client based on date of birth"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE18"/>
    <display value="Gender"/>
    <definition value="Gender of the client"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE19"/>
    <display value="Female"/>
    <definition value="Client identifies as female"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE20"/>
    <display value="Male"/>
    <definition value="Client identifies as male"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE21"/>
    <display value="Transgender male"/>
    <definition value="Client identifies as transgender male"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE22"/>
    <display value="Transgender female"/>
    <definition value="Client identifies as transgender female"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE23"/>
    <display value="Other"/>
    <definition value="Additional category"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE24"/>
    <display value="Other (specify)"/>
    <definition value="Additional category (please specify)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE25"/>
    <display value="Sex"/>
    <definition value="Sex of the client assigned at birth"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE26"/>
    <display value="Female"/>
    <definition value="Client identifies as female"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE27"/>
    <display value="Male"/>
    <definition value="Client identifies as male"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE28"/>
    <display value="Other"/>
    <definition
                value="Client identifies in non-binary way or as a sexual and gender minority (or minorities)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE29"/>
    <display value="Address"/>
    <definition
                value="Client's home address or address which the client is consenting to disclose"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE30"/>
    <display value="Marital Status"/>
    <definition value="Client's current marital status "/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE31"/>
    <display value="Unmarried"/>
    <definition value="Client does not have an active marriage contract"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE32"/>
    <display value="Never married"/>
    <definition value="Client has never entered into a marriage contract"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE33"/>
    <display value="Married"/>
    <definition value="A current marriage contract is active"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE34"/>
    <display value="Polygamous"/>
    <definition value="Client is in a polygamous union"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE35"/>
    <display value="Divorced"/>
    <definition
                value="Client is divorced, whereby marriage contract has been declared dissolved and inactive"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE36"/>
    <display value="Widowed"/>
    <definition value="Client's spouse has died"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE37"/>
    <display value="Unknown"/>
    <definition value="Client does not wish to disclose marital status"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE38"/>
    <display value="Domestic partner"/>
    <definition
                value="Client reports that they are in a domestic partnership"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE39"/>
    <display value="Annulled"/>
    <definition
                value="Client's marriage contract has been declared null and to have not existed"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE40"/>
    <display value="Legally separated"/>
    <definition value="Client is legally separated from their spouse"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE41"/>
    <display value="Interlocutory"/>
    <definition value="Client is subject to an interlocutory decree"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE42"/>
    <display value="Telephone number"/>
    <definition
                value="Client's telephone number (a landline or a mobile phone number)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE43"/>
    <display value="Administrative Area"/>
    <definition
                value="This should be a context-specific list of administrative areas, such as villages, districts, etc. The purpose of this data element is to allow for grouping and flagging of client data to a particular facility's catchment area. This can be input into the system by the end user OR it can be automated in the database based on the end user's attributes."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE44"/>
    <display value="Communication consent"/>
    <definition value="Indication that client gave consent to be contacted"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE45"/>
    <display value="Reminder messages"/>
    <definition
                value="Whether client wants to receive text or other messages as follow-up for HIV services"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE46"/>
    <display value="Communication preference(s)"/>
    <definition
                value="How the client would like to receive family planning communications"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE47"/>
    <display value="Text message/SMS"/>
    <definition
                value="The client would like to receive communications via Text message/SMS"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE48"/>
    <display value="Voice call"/>
    <definition
                value="Client would like to receive communications via voice call"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE49"/>
    <display value="Client's email"/>
    <definition
                value="Client's primary email account where the client can be contacted"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE50"/>
    <display value="Alternate contact's name"/>
    <definition
                value="Name of an alternate contact, which could be next of kin (e.g. partner, husband, mother, sibling, etc.). The alternate contact would be used in the case of an emergency situation."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE51"/>
    <display value="Alternate contact's phone number"/>
    <definition value="Phone number of the alternate contact"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE52"/>
    <display value="Alternate contact's address"/>
    <definition
                value="Alternate contact's home address or address which the client is consenting to disclose"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.A.DE53"/>
    <display value="Alternate contact relationship"/>
    <definition
                value="The alternate contact's relationship to the client (e.g. partner, husband, mother, sibling, etc.)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.B.DE1"/>
    <display value="Reason for visit"/>
    <definition value="Reason for HIV testing services visit"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.B.DE2"/>
    <display value="First-time HIV test"/>
    <definition
                value="First encounter for screening for human immunodeficiency virus"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.B.DE3"/>
    <display value="Retesting for HIV"/>
    <definition value="Retesting for human immunodeficiency virus"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.B.DE4"/>
    <display value="HIV testing services visit"/>
    <definition
                value="Client attending facility for HIV testing services visit"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.B.DE5"/>
    <display value="Referred through partner services"/>
    <definition
                value="Client reported coming to the facility after receiving a provider-assisted referral or patient referral from a contact or partner"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.B.DE6"/>
    <display value="Partner or contact of an index case"/>
    <definition
                value="The client is a contact or partner of a person diagnosed with HIV (an index case)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.B.DE7"/>
    <display
             value="Partner or contact of an HIV testing client (non-index case)"/>
    <definition
                value="The client is a contact or partner identified through partner or social network services, but is not known to be a partner of an index-case"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.B.DE8"/>
    <display value="Type of contact or partner for partner services"/>
    <definition
                value="Client's relationship to the person that referred the client for partner services or family services"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.B.DE9"/>
    <display value="Biological child"/>
    <definition
                value="Client is the biological child of the person that referred the client for family services"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.B.DE10"/>
    <display value="Drug-injecting partner"/>
    <definition
                value="Client is a drug-injecting partner of the person that referred the client for partner services"/>

    <code value="HIV.C.DE107"/>
    <display value="Sex factor for estimating creatinine clearance"/>
    <definition
                value="Value used for gender for calculating creatinine clearance if required. For transgender populations, the sex at birth is used in the Cockcroft-Gault equation if the person is not using hormone therapy; among transgender populations using hormone therapy for more than three months, the current gender can be used."/>
  </concept>

  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.D.DE46"/>
    <display value="Date of initiation on ART"/>
    <definition
                value="The date on which the client was first initiated on ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.D.DE47"/>
    <display value="Time on ART"/>
    <definition
                value="Time the client has been on ART since starting or restarting it in years and months"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.D.DE48"/>
    <display value="Date(s) ART restarted"/>
    <definition
                value="Date(s) client restarted ART after stopping (intentionally interrupting) for any number of reasons (see 'Reason ART stopped')"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.D.DE49"/>
    <display value="ART cohort"/>
    <definition
                value="Month and year client originally started ART (documented) at a health facility in the system. The cohort is a group of patients who started ART in the same month (or quarter) and year, whose status is followed over time, using the ART register."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.D.DE50"/>
    <display value="Transfer in for HIV care"/>
    <definition
                value="Client is transferring in with records or known ART drugs and ART start date"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.D.DE51"/>
    <display value="Date of transfer in"/>
    <definition
                value="Date client presented at facility (with transfer/referral slip) from another facility (and on ART) within the system"/>
  </concept>

    <code value="HIV.D.DE52"/>
    <display value="Facility transferred from"/>
    <definition value="Name of health facility client was transferred from"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.D.DE53"/>
    <display value="Date enrolled in HIV care"/>
    <definition
                value="Date client first enrols in HIV care at the facility. Begins when a person with a confirmed HIV diagnosis presents to a facility where HIV care is provided and a medical record, patient card, file or chart is opened for the first time. This could be at an HIV care/ART, MNCH or TB clinic."/>
  </concept>

                value="CD4 count at or below 250 cells/mm3 following clinical failure"/>
  </concept>

    <code value="HIV.D.DE228"/>

                value="The inability to achieve or maintain viral suppression below a certain threshold indicated by viral load above 1000 copies/mL based on two consecutive viral load measurements in 3 months, with adherence support following the first viral load test"/>

    <definition
                value="Type of treatment-limiting toxicity experienced by client. Treatment-limiting toxicity is defined as a serious adverse drug reaction that results in drug discontinuation or substitution. In addition, any reaction that leads to treatment interruption or requires changing the drug or regimen because of an adverse drug reaction is also considered a serious adverse drug reaction."/>
  </concept>

    <definition value="No known past pregnancy problems"/>

    <display value="Does not know of any past pregnancy complications"/>
    <definition
                value="Don't know if there were any problems during past pregnancies"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE20"/>
    <display value="Pre-eclampsia"/>
    <definition
                value="A condition specific to pregnancy, arising after the 20th week of gestation, characterized by hypertension and proteinuria. Oedema may also be present, but is no longer considered a cardinal sign because it is present to some extent in most pregnancies. If not controlled, pre-eclampsia will lead to eclampsia which is characterized by fits, followed by coma, and has a high mortality rate."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE21"/>
    <display value="Eclampsia"/>
    <definition
                value="A condition peculiar to pregnancy or a newly delivered woman, characterized by fits followed coma. The woman usually has hypertension and proteinuria. The fits may occur in the antepartum, intrapartum or early postpartum periods. "/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE22"/>
    <display value="Alcohol use"/>
    <definition value="Alcohol intake"/>
  </concept>

    <display value="Type of hypertensive disorder"/>
    <definition value="Type of hypertensive disorder of the mother"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE265"/>
    <display value="Chronic hypertension"/>
    <definition
                value="Hypertension detected pre-pregnancy or before 20 weeks' gestation"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE266"/>
    <display value="Essential"/>
    <definition
                value="Hypertension without a known secondary cause (pre-pregnancy or at less than 20 weeks)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE267"/>
    <display value="Secondary"/>
    <definition
                value="Hypertension with a known secondary cause (e.g. renal disease; detected pre-pregnancy or at less than 20 weeks)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE268"/>
    <display value="White-coat hypertension"/>
    <definition
                value="sBP greater than or equal to 140 and/or dBP greater than or equal to 90 mmHg when measured in the office or clinic, and BP less than 135/85 mmHg using HBPM or ABPM readings (pre-pregnancy or at less than 20 weeks)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE269"/>
    <display value="Masked hypertension"/>
    <definition
                value="BP that is less than 140/90 mmHg at a clinic/office visit, but greater then or equal to 135/85 mmHg at other times outside the clinic/ office (pre-pregnancy or at less than 20 weeks)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE270"/>
    <display value="Gestational hypertension"/>
    <definition
                value="Hypertension arising de novo at greater than or equal to 20 weeks' gestation in the absence of proteinuria or other findings suggestive of pre-eclampsia"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE271"/>
    <display value="Transient gestational hypertension"/>
    <definition
                value="Hypertension arising at greater than or equal to 20 weeks' gestation in the clinic, which resolves with repeated BP readings"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE272"/>
    <display value="Pre-eclampsia"/>
    <definition value="Pre-eclampsia"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.E.DE273"/>
    <display value="Superimposed on chronic hypertension"/>
    <definition
                value="Among women with chronic hypertension, development of new proteinuria, another maternal organ dysfunction(s), or evidence of uteroplacental dysfunction."/>
  </concept>

    <definition value="Client's contact is HIV-positive"/>

    <definition value="Client's contact is HIV-negative"/>

    <code value="HIV.PRV.DE20"/>

    <definition
                value="Client is currently on opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) at reporting date, defined according to country/program to account for medication dispensed and LTFU criterion"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.PRV.DE21"/>
    <display value="Retained on OAMT"/>
    <definition
                value="Client is retained on opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) at reporting date, defined according to country/program to account for medication dispensed and LTFU criterion"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.PRV.DE22"/>
    <display value="Client being inducted on OAMT"/>

    <definition value="First date on which client received maintenance dose"/>

    <definition value="Date the client was dispensed medications"/>

    <display value="Number of days prescribed"/>
    <definition value="Days of medication client has been prescribed"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE1"/>
    <display value="Population prevalence of TB"/>
    <definition
                value="The tuberculosis prevalence in the general population in number of cases per 100 000 persons or greater."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE2"/>
    <display
             value="Population prevalence of soil-transmitted helminth infection"/>
    <definition
                value="The percentage of individuals in the general population infected with at least one species of soil-transmitted helminths"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE3"/>
    <display value="Population incidence of HIV in the absence of PrEP"/>
    <definition
                value="HIV incidence number of cases per 100 person–years in the absence of PrEP"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE4"/>
    <display value="Population prevalence of HIV"/>
    <definition
                value="The proportion of the population that are HIV-positive"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE5"/>
    <display value="Prevalence of pretreatment NNRTI drug resistance"/>
    <definition
                value="Prevalence of pretreatment HIV drug resistance to NNRTIs among people initiating first-line ART"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE6"/>
    <display value="Malaria-endemic setting"/>
    <definition value="Whether the setting is a malaria-endemic setting"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE7"/>
    <display value="Population prevalence of syphilis"/>
    <definition value="The proportion of the population with syphilis"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE8"/>
    <display value="Population prevalence of hepatitis B"/>
    <definition
                value="The proportion of hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg) seroprevalence in the general population"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE9"/>
    <display value="Population prevalence of hepatitis C"/>
    <definition
                value="The proportion of hepatitis C virus (HCV) antibody seroprevalence in the general population"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE10"/>
    <display value="Prevalence of HIV in the catchment area"/>
    <definition
                value="The proportion of the population from the health facility's catchment area that are HIV-positive (estimated)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE11"/>
    <display value="Ultrasound available at the health facility"/>
    <definition
                value="Whether an ultrasound machine is available and functional in the facility and a trained health worker is available to use it"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE12"/>
    <display value="HIV burden of the setting"/>
    <definition
                value="HIV burden of the setting (high or low) based on the national HIV prevalence or where the HIV prevalence and/or incidence in a geographical setting is higher than national prevalence and, therefore, needs priority in the HIV response"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE13"/>
    <display value="High HIV burden setting"/>
    <definition
                value="Settings with &gt;5% national HIV prevalence and subpopulations and geographic settings where HIV prevalence and/or incidence is higher than nationally."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE14"/>
    <display value="Low HIV burden setting"/>
    <definition
                value="Settings with &lt;5% HIV national prevalence but where certain populations (primarily key populations and their partners) and geographic settings may have higher HIV prevalence and/or incidence than nationally and, therefore, need priority in the HIV response"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE15"/>
    <display value="HPV DNA testing operational at the health facility"/>
    <definition
                value="Is HPV DNA testing operational at the health facility for cervical cancer screening?"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE16"/>
    <display value="Routine viral load testing is available"/>
    <definition
                value="Routine viral load testing is available in the facility"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE17"/>
    <display value="Health facility ID"/>
    <definition
                value="Unique ID of the health facility that recorded the client. This ID could represent a universal health facility ID, if used in the country. Alternatively this ID can also be generated by the national surveillance system and assigned to reporting facility."/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE18"/>
    <display value="TB treating facility ID"/>
    <definition
                value="The facility where the client is receiving tuberculosis (TB) treatment"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE19"/>
    <display value="Other priority populations"/>
    <definition
                value="Other populations of priority of HIV prevention and care in local context (provided during adaptation)"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE20"/>
    <display value="Reporting period end date"/>
    <definition value="End date of the reporting period"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE21"/>
    <display value="Reporting period start date"/>
    <definition value="Start date of the reporting period"/>
  </concept>
  <concept>
    <code value="HIV.Config.DE22"/>
    <display value="Reporting date"/>
    <definition
                value="Reporting date, for surveys performed on a specific date"/>
  </concept>
</CodeSystem>
